jobTitle: Club Manager and Personal Trainer/Full-Time position Job in Melbourne - SEEK
jobText: TXT/50691624.txt	§Club Manager and Personal Trainer/Full-Time position§§More jobs from this company§§§§§§§§Job Description§§Job Header§§Club Manager and Personal Trainer/Full-Time position§§Advertiser: §MPT Transformations§§More jobs from this company§§§§Job Information§§Job Listing Date§§6 Oct 2020§§Location§§Melbourne§, §Eastern Suburbs§§Salary§§$60,000 - $74,999§§Work Type§§Full Time§§Classification§§Sport & Recreation§, §Fitness & Personal Training§§§§§§What’s in it for you?§We are seeking a highly motivated coach and club manager to look after our Rowville and Croydon studios. Someone who is a career-minded, sales driven individual, with fantastic customer services skills, a desire to want to learn and succeed and someone who wants to work hard and be rewarded for it.§This full-time position includes above award salary with the opportunity to train your own clients in-house as well. Remuneration will depend on experience and what value you can bring to the company.§Are you looking for?§A role where you are the go to leader of two fitness clubs and have a say in the direction of where we travel§A permanent salary position where you earn a stable income §without§ paying rent?§An all-rounded position where you can mentor members and be a coach in every facet of the client experience.§An opportunity to be more than just a “trainer”?§The opportunity to bring in your own clients and train them rent free?§At MPT we provide training in both resistance and HIIT classes, as well as one-on-one personal training sessions. With hundreds of members, our clubs operate on a culture of caring and accountability. §The role?§As club manager of two clubs, you will responsible for lead generation, increasing our membership base, building an incredible club culture and working with our team to ensure our standards are only ever improving.§You must be confident on the phone, have previous experience in sales (and be confident to do them), have a can-do attitude and want to work as part of a team. §You’ll also have experience as a personal trainer and be confident in taking both 1on1s and group sessions. We are looking for someone who always puts the clients first and who is a great listener and ready to go above and beyond for their clients. It’s about giving them a great workout, but also being able to build genuine relationships.§Your hours will be split between taking sessions and managing the club. §Flexible to work mornings, nights and Saturday mornings.§We offer:§Full time position including above award salary with the opportunity to train your own clients in-house as well. Salary will depend on experience and what value you can bring to the company.§The benefits of working for MPT:§Our coaches are the face of our business; they are the motivators and the people who are the point of contact and support for all of our members.§We believe in continual education and development. All of our coaches receive weekly in-house training from national fitness champions, internationally accredited powerlifting champions and coaches with 10 plus years of experience. We also provide external paid training to staff members looking to expand their knowledge base.§Additionally, all staff have the opportunity to expand their one-on-one training client base, with the opportunity to use our clubs rent-free.§At MPT, all of our staff are one. We all succeed on the back of hard work and a team environment where everyone has a chance to impact the direction of our clubs. From the writing up of programs to club direction, everyone has a say. We train together, we learn together, we grow together.§If you are hungry, motivated and want to be a great trainer, MPT is the club for you.§ §§§§The application form will include these questions:§§Have you completed a qualification in fitness?§§§

Come and join our team.§If you do not have any or a lot of experience in administration but understand how important a role a swimming teacher plays in a child overall development as a young person than this is the job for you and we will train you in your role as an administrator.§It is time for a change of environment and for an introduction into a great teaching program based on over seven decades of experience.§We are looking forward to hearing from you.§ §Job tasks and responsibilities§Happy, friendly personality.§Long term commitment.§Be your own person.§Teach swimming in a purpose built, body friendly heated mineral pool.§Impart to your pupils the joy of being confident in the water.§Job satisfaction knowing you make a difference in a child's life.§In your role as an administrator you would work closely with the teachers and upper management to ensure the smooth running of the program.§Build a bond with your pupils.§Opportunity to add new administration and teaching ideas to your resume.§Work closely with upper Management to ensure the smooth running of the swim school§Be self motivated and able to lead a team.§Opportunity to add new teaching ideas to your teaching skills.§Committed to making a difference in a child's life.§Above award rates of pay.§ §Skills and experience§Industry qualifications AUSTSWIM, ASCTA essential.§An open mind and commitment to making a difference in a child's life.§Previous Teaching experience is desirable§Be able to relate to children and parents.§Open to new ideas and understanding of Shaplands' tried and proven teaching method.§Work with our managers and existing teaching staff to deliver a semi-private high quality swimming lesson to all ages - babies to adults.§Be bright and bubbly and know how important this is to helping children and parents enjoy their experience at the swim school.§ §Job benefits and perks§MagnaPool mineral water gentle on your skin.§Incredible job satisfaction because of our personalised approach to teaching swimming.§Unique opportunity to join a really committed team.§Mature stable program.§Work in a unique teaching pool with 11 different water depths that add lots of variety to your lessons.§Plenty of on the job training.§ §§§§The application form will include these questions:§§Which of the following statements best describes your right to work in Australia?§Do you have a current Working With Children (WWC) Check?§Which of the following AUSTSWIM training courses have you completed?§How much notice are you required to give your current employer?§Do you own or have regular access to a car?§§§

We have some shifts available on weekday mornings (9am to 11:55am), weekday afternoons (3:30pm to 6:25pm), weekend mornings (8:25am to 11:55am) and weekend afternoons (2:25pm to 3:20pm). The right applicants for the role will also have a current Working with Children’s Check, a current resuscitation certificate and a current satisfactory National Police Clearance. jobText: TXT/50581651.txt	§Customer Service Officer (Lifeguard)§§More jobs from this company§§§§§§§§§§§Job Description§§Job Header§§Customer Service Officer (Lifeguard)§§Advertiser: §Wellington Shire Council§§More jobs from this company§§§§Job Information§§Job Listing Date§§17 Sept 2020§§Location§§Bairnsdale & Gippsland§§Salary§§$36.24 per hour§§Work Type§§Casual/Vacation§§Classification§§Sport & Recreation§, §Other§§§§§§Customer Service Officer (Lifeguard)§ §Position No. 767§ §Multiple Casual Positions (Limited)§ §Casual $36.24 per hour inclusive of 25% casual loading plus statutory superannuation (junior rates apply if under 21) § §Wellington Shire Council is seeking enthusiastic lifeguards to supplement our existing workforce over the coming 2020 - 2021 summer season. These casual positions are in the outdoor pool venues located in Sale, Heyfield, Maffra, Rosedale, Stratford and Yarram.§ §Summer season pools operate from November 2020 until March 2021 (subject to pool re-opening) with training provided at Aqua Energy prior to the opening of the summer season. Leisure Services – Customer Service Officers may be rostered to undertake one of, or a combination of responsibilities including lifeguard and cafe/kiosk operator.§ §All lifeguards are required to obtain and maintain the following: § § §Pool Lifeguard Certificate§ §Level 2 First Aid§ §Cardiopulmonary Resuscitation§ §Working with Children Check (if over 18 years of age)§ § §Please note, you can still apply if you do not have all the above stated qualifications, however you will be required to obtain them (at your own cost) before being rostered shifts.§ §The successful candidate will need to demonstrate how they meet the criteria below:§ § § §Qualifications and experience relevant to key responsibility areas.§ §Good communication and interpersonal skills.§ §Demonstrated ability to work as an effective team member in a team environment.§ §Strong customer focus.§ §Proven reliability with a strong work ethic.§ § §Why Wellington?§ §Wellington Shire Council use award-winning technologies to seek and implement innovative improvements across the organisation. We work hard to position ourselves as a leader in local government, continuously improving our diverse range of services for the betterment of our community.§ §We offer a rewarding culture of innovation, flexibility and continued learning in a collaborative, supportive environment.§ §Wellington Shire Council is committed to upholding the Child Safe Standards and associated legislative requirements.§ §Wellington Shire Council is an Equal Opportunity Employer and is proud to encourage applications from people of different backgrounds, abilities, ages, genders and/or sexual orientations and gender identities.§ §About Wellington§ §Wellington Shire is Victoria’s third largest municipality. Its 10,924m2 extends from the High Country through the Gippsland Plains to the famous Ninety Mile Beach. Sale is a 2.5 hour drive east of Melbourne and the region boasts excellent sporting, educational, and recreational facilities. jobTitle: Studio Manager Job in Sydney - SEEK
jobText: TXT/50554834.txt	§Studio Manager§§More jobs from this company§§§§§§§§§§Job Description§§Job Header§§Studio Manager§§Advertiser: §Orangetheory Fitness St Leonards§§More jobs from this company§§§§Job Information§§Job Listing Date§§12 Sept 2020§§Location§§Sydney§, §North Shore & Northern Beaches§§Salary§§$65,000 - $79,999 Package§§Work Type§§Full Time§§Classification§§Sport & Recreation§, §Management§§§§§§Orangetheory Fitness St Leonards is seeking the right person to take on the challenging and rewarding role as Studio Manager. § §You will be managing the Studio to achieve set targets and this will include owning the sales process, managing the facility upkeep, supporting the members in every way possible as well as meeting all security and OH&S obligations.§ §As Studio Manager, you will have a broad responsibility across all facets of the business each day to attend to and manage. You will need to be highly committed to the business and the studio, taking full ownership over the Studio at all times. This is an exciting role that provides a diversity of experience in running a premium Studio.§ §This is a §FULL TIME§ position but will require potential early mornings, evenings and weekend commitment from the Studio Manager.§ § § §ABOUT YOU§ §The position requires someone with:§ § §A proven history of performance in business management and team leadership§ §Exceptional sales skills and a personality that enjoys sales § §Ability to mutli-task whilst under pressure§ §An attitude towards work that is highly goals orientated§ §Comfortable with analysing numbers and developing strategies to achieve targets based on data§ §Proven to be genuinely capable of working to a high level without supervision § §Highly competent and savvy around programs such as Word, Excel and Outlook§ §You need to be a high performer and want to make a difference in peoples' lives - your staff and your members!§ §a deep understanding of Health and Fitness§ § § §YOUR KEY RESPONSIBILITIES WILL INCLUDE§ § §Drive the sales team to ensure sales targets are met, from active lead generation to appointments, managing walk-ins and ensuring the joining process is executed by your team with perfection each and every time§ §Manage all Studio operations and procedures to a high standard§ §Manage the ongoing Club Care Program to ensure our members have a fantastic experience every time§ §Be a key point of contact for all members to ensure their membership and experience with us is outstanding at all times§ §Perform administrative duties, maintain accurate customer information on the membership database, and use all technology and systems to their full extent§ §Build a great team to service the members.§ §Make people's day!§ § § §WHAT WE OFFER§ § §A team of Studio's to work within and grow yourself as a Studio Manager,§ §Career progression options for the right person§ §Salary range of $65-$80K initially, with performance based increases§ §Free Membership to Orangetheory Fitness Studio's we operate § § § §CAREER GROWTH AND SUPPORT§ §We operate several Studios across Australia, so when you step into this role you're not running a Studio on your own! You will have a team of other Studio Managers that all work closely together to support each other in driving their respective Studio's. The right candidate will have the potential to step up into the future, into further roles such as Cluster Management and/or Area Management, based on performance.§ § § §WHO SHOULD APPLY FOR THIS ROLE?§ §If you wish to apply for this position, you should meet the following:§ § §You've read all of the above, you're excited, and think you fit the description well§ §A proven history of sales, management or working in a Fitness Centre§ §You have impeccable presentation and communication§ §You live within a reasonable distance to the North Shore region in Sydney.§ §You have the right to work in Australia§ §Most of all, you have a good sense of humour, have a passion for fitness and helping people§ § § §If this is all for you, please apply!§ §Send us your cover letter and CV via the APPLY button below.§§§§The application form will include these questions:§§Which of the following statements best describes your right to work in Australia?§How many years of people management experience do you have?§Do you have a current Australian driver's licence?§Do you have experience working towards targets and KPIs?§§§

You will make a difference.§ §About Us§Since 2010, Best Body has been WA's leading Physio & Pilates Company for the Perth community.§  §Quality has always been our focus over quantity, and after 9 years of constantly fine-tuning our service, w§e have packaged up something epic and are now in growth-mode.§ §As a team, we are a group of i§nspired high-performers §who fundamentally §believe that humans have the ability to experience more magic moments by being at their best§. We believe that the traditional health and medical systems are broken and do not empower people with the right §support, guidance, and direction§ to live life fully.§ §We're changing that through a new kind of health model that puts the emphasis on developing the capability of the person to §make informed decisions, take control of their health, and live life at their best.§ §We're a fast-paced culture (seriously agile!)§ full of high performing A-players that have a tonne of fun each day but are committed to getting the job done.§ §We believe that when what you do is fueled by who you are, you will do your life's best work.§  §The Role§Working closely with our Health Professionals and Instructors, you'll be a part of the Instructor Team for our growing company and use your §energy and enthusiasm §to grow to move our brand forward.§  §You will be closely supported by our State Operations Leader and State Pilates Leader to §allow your development to flourish.§ You’ll be given the training, guidance, and mentoring to become confident quickly so you can achieve better client results. §  §Your new teaching role will include:§ § §Delivering fun, engaging and upbeat classes - §helping clients move towards the outcomes they are wanting to achieve§ §Make §genuine connections§ with our clients - inspiring them to move and §become the best version of themselves§ §Learning and developing the skills necessary to help clients implement healthy lifestyle changes § §You§You'll be a pivotal player in the Best Body Squad and be §empowered to really own the space and make your mark. §Most importantly, your work will matter, be §recognised and rewarded.§ §To thrive and succeed you will be able to bring to the table:§ § §A background as a Group Fitness Instructor with experience teaching Pilates, Yoga or Les Mills classes§ §Commitment to want to continue developing your class planning and delivery skills, with a §real can-do attitude§ §An obsession with §exceeding expectations §and making people feel genuinely cared for§ §A strong passion for all things related to Pilates §- you likely have a healthy lifestyle, love movement/exercise/Pilates (+ want to learn more) and enjoy sharing your knowledge with family and friends§ §A desire to be a part of a purpose-driven company.§ Best Body is a pretty incredible place and is focused in helping more people be at their best§ §You pride yourself on §self-accountability§ and §achieving §goals§ §If you're passionate about making a difference in other people's lives, then submit a cover letter and resume via SEEK to apply.§§§§The application form will include these questions:§§Which of the following statements best describes your right to work in Australia?§Have you completed a qualification in fitness?§How many years' experience do you have in the sports & fitness industry?§How much notice are you required to give your current employer?§§§

However if you love the process of becoming better at THE ART OF TEACHING ... then this job could be right for you.§Personal satisfaction, meaningfulness and happiness are the employee goals we aim to fulfil.§Our workplace isn’t for everyone and we are only interested in the coaches with teaching experience with children between the ages of 3 and 16. §  §This is a highly coveted position and we only take the best. §  §To be eligible to convert this role into a permanent full time position you need to be able to work one day on the weekend for 45 weeks of the year and successfully complete the trial period.§  §You are what we are looking for if ...§ § §You have relentless commitment for improvement and excellence§ §You are playful and professional§ §You are open to learning new skills§ §Your have charisma as a teacher§ §What will you do? ...§ § §Lead small classes of children § §Coach skills you have never taught before§ §Be responsible for their safety§ §Be responsible for planning your classes§ §Eligibility ...§ § §You have a minimum of 4 years teaching experience with children in this age range§ §You have a permanent working VISA § §NO holiday visas§ §You are invested in being a career coach in Melbourne§ §The application process is a 3 part process and only successful applicants will move onto the next stage.§  §1: Send in summary one page resume and cover letter§  §2: Phone or Skype interview with the Director§  §3: Panel interview with the leadership team§  §You MUST include a cover letter detailing WHY you want to work for our company and WHAT value you would bring to my team.§ §  §NOTE: The GREAT NEWS IS ... we have up to 3 full time positions that will become available in 2021 ... but we are looking for a teacher to start part time / casual with the team for the remainder of 2020. §  §IF YOU HAVE WHAT IT TAKES APPLY NOW!§  §email to: §david@kidsinmotion.com.au§  § §  § §  § §  § §  § §§§§§The application form will include these questions:§§Which of the following statements best describes your right to work in Australia?§Do you have a current Working With Children (WWC) Check?§Do you have a current Police Check (National Police Certificate) for employment?§How much notice are you required to give your current employer?§Do you have experience working with children?§§§

jobTitle: Personal Trainer Job in Sydney - SEEK
jobText: TXT/50612083.txt	§Personal Trainer§§More jobs from this company§§§§§§§§Job Description§§Job Header§§Personal Trainer§§Advertiser: §Anytime Fitness§§More jobs from this company§§§§Job Information§§Job Listing Date§§22 Sept 2020§§Location§§Sydney§, §Ryde & Macquarie Park§§Work Type§§Contract/Temp§§Classification§§Sport & Recreation§, §Fitness & Personal Training§§§§§§A rare opportunity has arisen for a collective of personal trainers to join our high-performance unit to work at our community-focused clubs on a NONE rental fee split model in our Sydney based locations.§  §Anytime Fitness West Ryde§  § §  §TIME FOR A CHANGE§  § §  §As our personal training sector expands, we wanted to do things differently from what we currently see in the Fitness industry.  Personal trainers have to become start-up entrepreneurs and business experts almost immediately. With absolutely no business skills, all the while trying to hold onto their fitness dream of helping people change their lives in a positive way.§  §What this results in, is the majority of coaches don’t ever reach their full potential, they are stricken for time and work ridiculous hours, they feel anxious and are highly stressed from continuous financial insecurity & they are left scorned and dejected by the fitness industry.§  § §  §OUR FOCUS§  § §  §With our change in mind, we provide our coaches with the utmost advantage in not only improving their personal training skill set but also their business skillset as well. We provide all of our coaches with extensive tutelage & mentoring on business strategy, marketing, sales, financial planning, budgeting, brand development, and self-development along with Advanced program design  ensuring all of our coaches have successful longevity within the industry and continuously fulfill their goals.§  § §  §CRITERIA§  § §  §Our selection criteria does not require you to have an extensive background in Personal training. What we do require is our candidates have an altruistic focus towards members and staff, enthusiastic attitude, a strong work-ethic, growth mindset and a willingness to continuously acquire new skills through our coaching.§  § §  §We live by the values and philosophy of People, Purpose, Profits & Play. §Amazing People, Strong Purpose, Profiting from our hard work (both financially and emotionally). With this in mind, we want you to have a significant role in maintaining our exceptional club culture. Our clubs are always highly engaging and interactive, and we pride ourselves on providing a fulfilling customer experience to all of our members.§  § §  §BENEFITS OF THE ROLE:§  § §  §·      Pay no rent. Split fee model for financial freedom§  §·      Pre-qualified leads from our on-boarding member program§  §·      Internal training certifications§  §·      Attractive split fee options for long tenure personal trainers  §  §·      Learn how to run and operate a successful sustainable personal training business§  §·      Be a part of an infectious high performing team culture§  §·      Succession planning for positions in management or mentoring§  §·      Enjoy coming to work§  §·      Master effective training and nutritional methodologies for regular transformations§  §·      Learn how to master your sales funnel to improve referral generation, quality leads and sales close ratios§  §·      Gain comprehensive knowledge on business strategy, marketing, social media strategy, financial planning, brand design. Which is essential for a successful PT career§  §·      Extensive mentoring, coaching & guidance§  §·      Utilise our tech-savvy approach with Apps to optimise the professionalism of your business§  §·      Weekly check-ins and monthly Performance meet with your PTM§  § §  §ABOUT THE ROLE§  § §  §·      One on one personal training sessions§  §·      Goal setting consults§  §·      Small group training sessions§  §·      CRM utilisation§  §·      Assisting with onboarding§  §·      Management of session planning§  § §  §CANDIDATES WILL NEED THE FOLLOWING QUALIFICATIONS§  § § § §Certificate 3 & 4 in Fitness (minimum)§ §Public Liability Insurance§ §Senior First Aid & CPR§ §Police Record Check§ §Working with Children’s Check§ §ABN Number§ § §  §If you love helping people,believe you are the right fit for our team and your goal is to develop into this type of personal trainer, then please take action and apply now. §  § §§§§The application form will include these questions:§§Which of the following statements best describes your right to work in Australia?§Which of the following First Aid accreditations do you currently hold?§§§

Part time and casual positions are available. Shift lengths available between 3 - 8 hours daily, 2:30pm start on weekdays.§Please refer to your martial arts experience in your application.§  § §§§§The application form will include these questions:§§Which of the following statements best describes your right to work in Australia?§Which of the following First Aid accreditations do you currently hold?§Do you have a current Australian driver's licence?§Do you own or have regular access to a car?§What's your expected hourly rate?§§§Right to live and work§§You must have the§ right to live and work §in this location to apply for this job.§§§

jobText: TXT/50574452.txt	§Personal Trainer - Outdoor Group Fitness§§More jobs from this company§§§§§§§§Job Description§§Job Header§§Personal Trainer - Outdoor Group Fitness§§Advertiser: §Running Wild Fitness§§More jobs from this company§§§§Job Information§§Job Listing Date§§16 Sept 2020§§Location§§Perth§, §Northern Suburbs & Joondalup§§Salary§§$40 per session (1 hour)§§Work Type§§Casual/Vacation§§Classification§§Sport & Recreation§, §Fitness & Personal Training§§§§§§About the business§ § § §We're a small, locally owned and run OUTDOOR training group, and we pride ourselves on offering a variety of challenging, yet achievable sessions that suit all levels of fitness.§ §We believe life should be full of fun, and so can exercise! Whilst we usually train from a permanent location, we also love to "run wild" and take our sessions to various places by the river, and occasionally to the coast.§ §From the newbie exerciser, to the super fit, we offer a variety of options to challenge our fittest, whilst comfortably guiding our beginners to progress to their next level.§ §We instruct everything from river run sessions, boxing & kickboxing for fitness, circuit training, HIIT, strength & core conditioning, stretching & recovery, and boot camps.§ § § §About the role§ § § §MUST HAVES§You are available for some Monday and/or Friday mornings 9AM, as well as 5:45AM and/or 6PM on those days if required. § §You are experienced with outdoor group fitness and know how to make use of the wide open space.§ §You have your own reliable car and driver's licence.§ §You have experience teaching boxing for fitness (primarily using kick shields &/or focus pads).§ §You can safely and effectively warm up the members to avoid injuries.§ §You can confidently offer progressions (or regressions) to cater for various fitness levels, ages and abilities. § §You can 'walk the talk'. You are able to get down on the members' levels, do it with them and can keep up with them (to some degree).§ §You will be responsible for the setup / pack up of the session, warm up, workout and cool down / stretch.§DESIRABLE§You own some basic good quality equipment that you're happy to transport and use in your sessions if required, or you're willing to collect the necessary equipment from my storage / garage in Bayswater as required. NB: We do not store equipment at our venues.§ §PLEASE REFER TO THE CRITERIA ABOVE WHEN EMAILING YOUR RESUME, COVER LETTER AND AVAILABILITY. §Send to Eva: §eva@runningwildfitness.net§ or apply online and tell us why you think you're suitable for this role. Generic resumes & cover letters will not be accepted.§ §Thank you for your application. Only those who are shortlisted will be contacted to arrange an 'interview' . (Come and jump in on a session and see if you like it and then we can have a chat afterwards!) § § § §Benefits and perks§ § § §We are always looking for new ways to develop and enhance our sessions, and provide a fun training experience for our members - we invite you to bring any special fitness skills or training to our program, with the opportunity to lead your own sessions each week.§ §You will receive very competitive rates for a group fitness trainer at $40 per session (with a 3-month $30 probation rate). An opportunity not to be missed!§ §No overheads or costly rental fees, this is an awesome opportunity to learn new skills and gain experience in a group exercise environment, where the members are already provided for you!§ §The position would suit an experienced trainer in a group outdoor setting. This role has opportunity for growth as the business expands with potential as my 2IC. § §Our sessions are only held in the mornings and evenings, which allows for a great work/life balance, and the opportunity to either continue to work or study during the day, or catch up on errands, chill out time, or meeting up with a friend for lunch!§ §On the days you're not running the sessions, then come and join in for some free training of your own!§ § § §Skills and experience§ § § §This position would suit someone who:§- Has a minimum of 2-years industry experience.§- Has some availability for 9AM Monday / Friday if required, and some 5:45AM and/or 6PM, and some 6:45AM Saturdays).§- Is genuinely passionate for fitness & the outdoors.§- Has experience with boxing, HIIT, cardio & strength.§- Is knowledgeable (or experienced) in the exercise & health industry and/or nutrition.§- Has a fun, loveable and warm sense of humour§- Has the confidence to train groups of 5-15 people.§- Experience with social media & marketing would be advantageous.§- Available for consistent and regular hours each week.§- Ability to connect with people of all ages & fitness levels.§- Fun-loving & reliable.§- The opportunity to BYO equipment if you have any!§ § §§§§The application form will include these questions:§§How many years' experience do you have as a personal trainer?§Have you completed a qualification in fitness?§Do you have a current Australian driver's licence?§Do you own or have regular access to a car?§§§

jobTitle: Fitness Instructor / Personal Trainer / Coach Job in Brisbane - SEEK
jobText: TXT/50574454.txt	§Fitness Instructor / Personal Trainer / Coach§§More jobs from this company§§§§§§§§§§Job Description§§Job Header§§Fitness Instructor / Personal Trainer / Coach§§Advertiser: §F45 Training Nundah§§More jobs from this company§§§§Job Information§§Job Listing Date§§16 Sept 2020§§Location§§Brisbane§, §CBD & Inner Suburbs§§Work Type§§Part Time§§Classification§§Sport & Recreation§, §Fitness & Personal Training§§§§§§§Are you passionate about fitness? Is your personality energetic and confident? Want to enjoy going to work and earn great $$$? If "YES", we want YOU!§ §-------------§ §The Fastest Growing Fitness Brand§ §F45 Training is the fastest growing fitness brand in the world and here's your chance to be a part of that! F45 Nundah, F45 Kelvin Grove and F45 Annerley are looking to recruit awesome fitness professionals.§ §World Class Fitness Professionals§ §What's in the DNA of an F45 trainer? We want highly professional, energetic, bubbly personalities here. Our members work extremely hard for 45 minutes, we need you to keep them pumped throughout the session, even when the going gets tough, they need you to help them through it. But this is not personal training, there are 20+ other members who also need you to lift their spirits, or correct their technique! We certainly need you to have the relevant fitness qualifications, but it's more than that. Can you walk the floor, giving more attention to the new guy who has never been to a gym before, whilst at the same time pumping up the spirits of the two ladies who are on the other side of the room, getting through a 60 second set of burpees, all with a big smile on your face? Welcome to F45.§ §What's your role?§ §Glad you asked! As F45 have a dedicated Athletics Department who program all of our unique HIIT sessions, the good news is that you don't need to spend hours doing this yourself! You will need to familiarise yourself with the day's program, ensuring that you are comfortable and competent to demonstrate the correct exercise techniques during the session demonstration. This includes offering progressive and regressive options. Once the session starts, it's all systems go. Your primary responsibility is to keep energy levels high and ensure correct technique is being practised. At the end of the session, congratulate and high-five members, whilst also engaging them for feedback on the session and discussing their fitness goals.§ §We are very proud of the community we have built and would love to add the "right" person to it!§ §The Nitty Gritty§  § §Experience in group fitness and F45 Training is desirable but not essential (the right personality §is §essential).§ §A minimum Certificate III in Fitness, current Senior First Aid (and CPR), an ABN and personal insurance cover are definitely required.§ §Ongoing training is provided on the job, however there is also a requirement to attend some F45 "train the trainer" workshops from time to time.§ §This is a great opportunity for a fitness industry graduate, a seasoned pro, or someone looking for incremental income.§ §Our Brisbane studios are located at Nundah, Kelvin Grove and Annerley so you must be able to work at one or all three of these locations.§ §We look forward to hearing from you!§§§§The application form will include these questions:§§Which of the following statements best describes your right to work in Australia?§Have you completed a qualification in fitness?§§§

jobTitle: Swim Squad Coach - Tobruk Job in Cairns & Far North - SEEK
jobText: TXT/50651253.txt	§Swim Squad Coach - Tobruk§§More jobs from this company§§§§§§§§§§Job Description§§Job Header§§Swim Squad Coach - Tobruk§§Advertiser: §Belgravia Health & Leisure Group§§More jobs from this company§§§§Job Information§§Job Listing Date§§29 Sept 2020§§Location§§Cairns & Far North§§Work Type§§Part Time§§Classification§§Sport & Recreation§, §Coaching & Instruction§§§§§§Enjoy a great work / life balance  §Leave your mark leading our passionate swimming squads§Full time permanent position§ §This is a great opportunity for a competitive, dedicated and passionate swimming squad coach looking to take their career to the next level!§ § §The Company§ §Belgravia Leisure is part of the Belgravia Health and Leisure Group (BHLG) and is the fastest growing leisure organisation in Australia. Our core areas of business and facilities stewardship include health clubs, wellness and spa, golf, aquatic and sporting venues in 150 locations across Australia and New Zealand. § §The Site§ §Patrons visiting §Tobruk Memorial Pool§ can enjoy a FINA approved 50m Olympic swimming pool, 25m lap pool and a warm water therapy pool. As well as a toddler splash area, the Flow Rider, a Café, two function rooms and retail shop. § §The Role§ §The §Swim Squad Coach§ develops training plans that show progression for swimmers through the levels and effectively lead the team of instructors to develop the program and pathway from the Swimming and Water Safety program.§About You§ §You  enjoy swimming, love working with children through to adult athletes and want to teach the skills and attributes of competitive swimming and water safety to others. § §The successful applicant will demonstrate the ability to communicate and interact effectively with students that have a diverse range of ages, abilities and needs. Demonstrating the ability to work effectively both independently and as a strong and valuable part of the team.§ §The successful applicant will be able to demonstrate a capacity to deliver the following essential skills:§Effectively lead a team to develop the program and pathway to achieve the outcomes§Ensure safe, efficient and cost effective operations of the squad program within company and legislative guidelines.§Actively promote the squad program and participation in the affiliated Swimming Club.§Ensure that you are adequately qualified for the program you are delivering and all squad activities are conducted in a safe manner in a safe environment, as per the company guidelines.§Monitor Progression of swimmers through the squad program and work with the Swimming and Water Safety program to identify talented swimmers and encourage participation in the squad program.§In conjunction with the squad program, encourage participation in and conduct all swimming competitions in a safe manner in a safe environment.§ §Essential§Teacher of Competitive Swimming / Competitive Strokes§Bronze level Qualification - Preferred§Current First Aid Certificate§Current CPR Certificate§BLUE card§Previous experience and success in a comparable role§Excellent verbal communication skills§ §You may be required to work mornings, evenings and weekends and attend competitions throughout the year and must be empathetic to the needs of the swimming and water safety program and other user groups in the facility.§ § § If you are a passionate person who realises the tremendous opportunity that this role offers and want to utilise your skills and passion in an aquatic and leisure environment, we want to hear from you!§ §Simply complete the application process by clicking the apply button and we’ll be in touch. §Cairns North 4870 QLD§§§§

jobTitle: F45 Coach/Trainer - F45 Training Gosford Job in Gosford & Central Coast - SEEK
jobText: TXT/50550183.txt	§F45 Coach/Trainer - F45 Training Gosford§§More jobs from this company§§§§§§§§§§§Job Description§§Job Header§§F45 Coach/Trainer - F45 Training Gosford§§Advertiser: §HealthyPeople§§More jobs from this company§§§§Job Information§§Job Listing Date§§11 Sept 2020§§Location§§Gosford & Central Coast§§Work Type§§Casual/Vacation§§Classification§§Sport & Recreation§, §Fitness & Personal Training§§§§§§JOIN THE COAST'S PREMIER FUNCTIONAL FITNESS FACILITY§  §Do you get freakin' excited and pride yourself on providing fun, fresh and effective coaching sessions, delivering awesome customer service and showing people that fitness is FUN?§  §Hey! We are Marcela & Cam and we are on a MISSION to bring results to our local community. Great…heard it before, right? What makes us different?§  §This is not traditional group fitness. If you expect to come in, teach a class, smile and cheerlead then stop reading this ad now…don’t worry though, there’s plenty of gyms around that you will fit straight in to. We provide an individualised service to our members, providing them with the level of support, coaching and accountability they need to achieve Life Changing results. F45 Gosford attracts a down to earth, supportive and fun community. Our F45 sessions are legendary, but our team is what sets us apart from the rest. If you are EXCITED right now, visit §www.bit.ly/F45job§ immediately.§  §Mission for the Role:§ § §To provide world-class coaching in a group environment. We are not a large Bootcamp, or big box gym, we care for each individual and deliver measurable results for our members. § §To work closely with the owners to ensure the member experience is 5 Star, plus develop and grow the business through outstanding customer service to F45 Gosford members, staff, suppliers and audience.§ §To cultivate a strong sense of community and create raving fans of F45 Gosford. Be dedicated to achieving F45 Gosford’s Mission and embracing and living out our Core Values.§ §Core Values§  §Commitment -§ you do what you say you will§  §Nutrition §- nourish your body with simple, whole foods most of the time but if you want cake, eat the damn cake (just not during the F45 Challenge, of course!)§  §Community §- friendly, uplifting, supportive and authentic§  §Movement §- fun, functional, adventurous movement to LIVE your best life§  §Outcomes §  §With our guidance and training, your Coach Position Outcomes will be:§ § §Deliver world-class coaching§ §Produce two x member video testimonials every month§ §Generate two new client referrals every month§ §Produce 80% conversion rate from Consult to New Member§ §Continuously improving the session delivery to keep clients moving towards their goals and ensuring sessions are effective, enjoyable and fresh.§ §Continual professional and personal development every month§ §Tasks (How you'll achieve the above outcomes)§ § §Demonstrate proper exercise coaching and instruction, including providing alternatives for members who are injured or incapacitated in some way during that session. (You need to have a working knowledge of the human body - muscles, movements and functions)§ §Deliver inspiring, motivational and interesting fitness sessions including changes in voice/pitch, challenging members to achieve PB’s and directing traffic in the studio to ensure swift station transitions§ §Encourage member participation, not just for regular F45 sessions, but for all fitness and social events§ §Ask 2 members (per month) to participate in a testimonial, take video and the copy to accompany it§ §Ask members for referrals, in line with our referral process§ §Conduct new prospect health consults using our prospect to client process§ §Attend Team Meetings§ §Attend Team Workshops§ §Attend Performance Appraisals§ §Skills & Attributes§  §These are the skills and attributes you must already have in order to qualify for this position:§  §Honesty and Integrity§ - Earns trust and maintains confidences.  Values open communication and feedback.§  §Learns quickly§ - Demonstrates the ability to quickly and proficiently understand and absorb new information. Uses initiative.§  §Communication Skills§ - Our members are VERY important to us. You will be comfortable conversing in-person, on the phone and via video calls, and know-how to conduct yourself professionally and deliver clear instructions.§  §People skills and personality§ - You must LOVE working with people! This is an uplifting studio and you must be able to show our members energy and excitement while working with them.§  §High Standards§ - Expects personal performance and team performance to be nothing short of the best. Values their personal appearance. Has a strong work ethic.§  §Teamwork -§ Reaches out to peers and cooperates with supervisors to establish an overall collaborative working relationship.§  §Flexibility/Adaptability§ - Ability to think on their feet.  §  §Qualifications§  §Must-Have:§ § §Certificate III in Fitness§ §Certificate IV in Fitness§ §Current CPR Certification§ §Current First Aid Certification§ §Group Training experience§ §Bonus Qualifications and Experience (nice to have but NOT essential):§ § §Registered with a Fitness Association§ §Nutrition Course or Certification§ §Working in a Team Environment§ §Customer Service Experience§ §Basic computer competency§ §Happy to be in front of the camera and competent with recording videos/photos§ §Apply now!§  §If this opportunity EXCITES you and you're looking to make health and fitness your career, then complete the application form at §www.bit.ly/F45job§ and if we agree, we'll get in touch!§§§§

Our trainers inspire their Clients through:§ §· One on One Personal Training and Group Training Sessions§ §· Goal Setting and Nutrition Sessions§ §· Seminar and Shopping Tours§ §We will take care of all the hard stuff so you can focus on getting clients great results.§ §· You won’t be required to pay rent.§ §· Vision will look after all your tax obligations and insurances.§ §· Vision will provide you with a full 2XU PT Uniform.§ §SKILLS AND EXPERIENCE§ §All applicants must have:§ §· Certificate IV in Fitness or currently under going course§ §· Current Senior First Aid certificate and CPR/AED certification§ §· A Valid Working with Children Check (WWC)§ §· A positive attitude and eagerness to grow and develop with us!§ §· A genuine interest in understanding nutrition and macro nutrients.§ §BUSINESS SUMMARY§ §You will work with some of the best trainers in the industry to become the absolute best you can be. Be lead by studio owner Nathan Weidemann with 10+ years in the industry being named Victorian PT of the Year and developed other Personal Trainings to win the same award, including rookie PT of the Year from VisionPT Prahran§ §VISION CULTURE§ §Vision has an infectious culture, with positive mind-set shifts and life-transformations as part of our day-to-day! At Vision, it is our culture that makes us unique. Our studio is filled with vibrant fitness enthusiasts striving to bring out the best in each other, encouraging us to reach our potential every single day.§OUR EXPECTATIONS§- Have a never ending attitude towards growth and develope§- Willingness to fail and learn from mistakes in our team environment. Embrace set back to learn and grow.§- Be a Goal setter and achiever. AA willingness to challenge yourself to be better ever day while impacting peoples lives§- Be a Role Model, we encourage a balanced lifestyle while leading by example with exercise and nutrition to inspire all members§BONUS§- Our proven Career Path will give you the ability to become a Mentor to new Trainers where you'll be remunerated for successfully Training Trainers§- Management - Master being a PT to enable you to lead an entire team. Bonus's awarded based on the success of the Team§- Owner - If you have a desire and passion for long term career our goal will be to developer a Trainer in 3-5 Years to own their own Personal Training Business.§Contact Nathan Weidemann by applying to this ad to organise a Zoom Interview along with sedning your CV thru.§Thanks you and look forward to finding our next Personal Trainer to join our Team and support your Goals and Dreams§§§§

jobTitle: Lifeguard  Job in Melbourne - SEEK
jobText: TXT/50629163.txt	§Lifeguard §§More jobs from this company§§§§§§§§Job Description§§Job Header§§Lifeguard §§Advertiser: §URBNSURF§§More jobs from this company§§§§Job Information§§Job Listing Date§§24 Sept 2020§§Location§§Melbourne§, §Northern Suburbs§§Work Type§§Casual/Vacation§§Classification§§Sport & Recreation§, §Coaching & Instruction§§§§§§About the business§ §The URBNSURF Mission is to build and operate world-class surf parks in Australia that deliver high-quality man-made waves and authentic surfing experiences to new and existing surfers of all ages, experience and ability.§Our strategic intent is for URBNSURF Melbourne to be commercially successful and be seen as the market leader in the creation of authentic surf experiences.§Within this context, the §Lifeguards§ will contribute to the strategic intent by focusing on providing a §safe and authentic experience for our guests. § § §About the role§ §The§ Lifeguards§ are responsible for ensuring guest safety by utilising preventative and management strategies within the Victorian State Guidelines. They will aid in setting the overall culture by ensuring a consistent and exemplary customer experience within URBNSURF Melbourne. §We are seeking surfers and non-surfers of all genders, ages, backgrounds and abilities. You must have a friendly, upbeat attitude and an efficient, adaptable work ethic.§Working as a Lifeguard at URBNSURF Melbourne is the ideal job to work flexible hours. § §Benefits and perks§ §URBNSURF Melbourne is Australia's first surf park§URBNSURF has projects in Melbourne and Sydney with plans to develop further locations across Australia in the next few years.§Extensive opportunities to #surfmore§URBNSURF will provide you with unique world-class training in Surf park lifeguarding.§ §Skills and experience§Interested applicants will need the following:§Have an interest/experience in the ocean or surfing§Be a hardworking, upbeat, efficient and adaptable individual§Look presentable§Lifeguards must be able to swim 50 meters in 45 seconds and hold the following valid certificates:§Pool Lifeguard qualification§First Aid and CPR§It is preferable for Lifeguards to also hold one of the following:§OSSCA – Australian Professional Ocean Lifeguard Association§SLSA - Bronze Medallion§Surf Rescue Certificate: SLSA Community Award§Successful applicants will be required to (if you do not hold it already) a:§Working with Children Check§ §This lifeguarding role will provide you with experience in a unique aquatic environment and will enable you to expand your skills set into the rapidly emerging surf park industry.§This is a casual role and permanent residency is essential.§ §How to apply§Please click apply and upload your resume and qualifications with your application. §Only successful candidates will be contacted. Applications close Sunday 11 October. §For further information on URBNSURF or any other job opportunities please visit our website §www.urbnsurf.com.§ §URBNSURF has developed a COVIDSafe plan in collaboration with external government agencies to ensure we cover OHS/WHS regulations to provide a safe environment for guests and staff. § § §§§§The application form will include these questions:§§Which of the following statements best describes your right to work in Australia?§Which of the following First Aid accreditations do you currently hold?§Do you have a current Royal Life Saving Pool Lifeguard certificate?§Do you have a current Working With Children (WWC) Check?§Do you have customer service experience?§§§

jobTitle: Swim Instructor  Job in Sydney - SEEK
jobText: TXT/50674492.txt	§Swim Instructor §§More jobs from this company§§§§§§§§Job Description§§Job Header§§Swim Instructor §§Advertiser: §Fitness First Australia Pty Limited§§More jobs from this company§§§§Job Information§§Job Listing Date§§2 Oct 2020§§Location§§Sydney§, §Southern Suburbs & Sutherland Shire§§Salary§§Competitive hourly rate + Super + Gym §§Work Type§§Casual/Vacation§§Classification§§Sport & Recreation§, §Coaching & Instruction§§§§§§§§§  §    §    §      §Swim Instructor §      §        §Be inspirational.§        §We believe that fitness inspires people to go further in life.§        §Working at Fitness First is more than a paying job, it's a choice to give people the opportunity to lead a fearless and extraordinary life.§        §Whatever the capacity they work in, our people use their expertise, attitude and ambition to create that opportunity for people every day.§        §Who You Are:§        §Swimming is an integral part of our Australian culture, and we feel that every person, no matter their age should have the opportunity to learn to swim. At Fitness First, we are on a mission to teach this life changing skill, providing our members and the people they care for the confidence to live a fit and fearless life.§        §We are looking for instructors who are passionate about swimming, reliable and eager to provide exceptional experiences and customer service.§        §We currently have multiple opportunities at our Sylvania Club. These are casual roles and candidates must be available to work up to 10-12 hours a week (2.5-3 hours a day). §        §What you should bring:§        §          §Passion for aquatics and dedicated to our mission to teach this life changing skill§          §AUSTSWIM or Swim Australia qualification§          §Current CPR certificate and Working with Children Check§          §Experience in teaching young children (6 months to 7 years) is highly desired§          §Willingness to comply with and carry out all implemented Work Health and Safety related activities and processes§        §        §In return we offer you:§        §          §A passionate, energetic and supportive culture. It's something we're really proud of at Fitness First and you'll feel part of the family from day one §          §Industry leading learning and development - we pride ourselves on supporting and developing our staff, providing them with the learning and skills they need to build a long term career across Clubs, Management and Support Office. jobText: TXT/50560662.txt	§Personal Trainer / Group Fitness Instructor§§More jobs from this company§§§§§§§§Job Description§§Job Header§§Personal Trainer / Group Fitness Instructor§§Advertiser: §Fit N Fab Fitness§§More jobs from this company§§§§Job Information§§Job Listing Date§§14 Sept 2020§§Location§§Brisbane§, §Bayside & Eastern Suburbs§§Salary§§$30 - $39.99 per hour§§Work Type§§Casual/Vacation§§Classification§§Sport & Recreation§, §Fitness & Personal Training§§§§§§Personal Trainer/Group Fitness Instructor§ §DO YOU HAVE A PASSION FOR HEALTH & FITNESS? § §DO YOU CARE ABOUT POSITIVE OUTCOMES FOR YOU & YOUR CLIENTS? § §DO YOU WANT TO WORK IN A FRIENDLY & FUN ENVIRONMENT? TRAINING IS TAKEN SERIOUSLY.§ §FIT N FAB FITNESS ARE SEEKING A PERSONAL TRAINER WITH GROUP FITNESS INSTRUCTOR QUALIFICATIONS. § §Duties/responsibilities:§ §Main Role - Personal Trainer: Working in a Personal Training Studio that operates 6 days a week (Monday to Saturday - closed Sunday & public holidays PLUS a 2 week shut down over christmas / new year). § §Fit N Fab Fitness have been operating for over 5 years and were winners of the Best Fitness Retailer Award, Redlands 2019.§ §Personal Training services are one on one and couples training. We also offer group fitness classes. We provide fitness & nutrition challenges throughout the year.§ §We are not a gym!§ §As a personal training studio we act as a wellness hub also which includes massage and physiotherapy. We are looking at expanding both our fitness and health services over the next 6 months.§ §Personal Trainers - Certificate 3 and 4 qualified please only apply. Experience is preferred but not essential.§ §Secondary Role - Fitness Instructor:  Your Group Fitness Instructor qualification has the potential for you to use as little or as much as you like! You must be able to self organise & perform functional cardio/cross training based group fitness classes. Pilates and Yoga will be viewed upon highly.§ §All equipment is supplied for Personal Training & Classes.§ §Working hours/days:§ §This position will ideally suit a student or part/full time worker with another job who initially requires working approximately 10-20 hours per week & who may consider looking at Personal Training eventually as a full time position here. § §As an ongoing part of Fit N Fab Fitness, you are paid per client and per group class.§ §For the first month of employment you are paid $200 per week to get you started.§ §Client sessions can be adapted to suit your available days and times. Your ability to be flexible however will be viewed admirably & will be one of our priorities for employment. The opportunity to cover full time during holiday/term breaks will be ideal.§ §Required skills/experience: § §- Certificate 3 in Fitness§ §- Certificate 4 in Personal Training (Face to Face learning qualified preferred) OR Graduate Diploma of Exercise and Sports Science§ §- CEC's 20 up to date or equivalent PDP's § §- CPR / First Aid up to date§ §- Sales experience will be regarded highly§ §Friendly customer service skills, a hard working ethic, a good sense of humour, and an attitude and demeanour of sincerity, care, and honesty is a prerequisite. § §Transport: §Drivers License and own transport is essential.§ §Please forward all applications, including a short cover note with an attached resume to email: §karentrojan70@gmail.com§ § §Please place in the email header:§ §ATTENTION: Karen and Nicole - Personal Trainer Job Applicant§ §For any questions about the job role, please email your queries to the above mentioned email address. § §PLEASE FORWARD YOUR APPLICATION BY 5pm Friday 18th September, 2020. § §AN IMMEDIATE START IS DESIRED & INTERVIEWS WILL BE EXPEDITED FROM MONDAY 21/9/2020.§§§§§The application form will include these questions:§§Which of the following statements best describes your right to work in Australia?§Which of the following First Aid accreditations do you currently hold?§Have you completed a qualification in fitness?§How many years' experience do you have in the sports & fitness industry?§§§

jobTitle: Swimming Instructors - Adelaide Aquatic Centre Job in Adelaide - SEEK
jobText: TXT/50647037.txt	§Swimming Instructors - Adelaide Aquatic Centre§§More jobs from this company§§§§§§§§§§§Job Description§§Job Header§§Swimming Instructors - Adelaide Aquatic Centre§§Advertiser: §City of Adelaide§§More jobs from this company§§§§Job Information§§Job Listing Date§§28 Sept 2020§§Location§§Adelaide§§Work Type§§Casual/Vacation§§Classification§§Sport & Recreation§, §Coaching & Instruction§§§§§§A place as positive as you. § §A role with more to dive into. § §Multiple Casual opportunities located in stunning North Adelaide.§ § § §About Us§ §From the start, the vision for Adelaide was a city of the future – one that celebrated its unique natural surrounds and structured its footprint in a way that would allow it to adapt to the changing needs of the community and a dynamic global landscape. Our focus is on our community’s wellbeing and quality of life - investing in city improvements and on future planning, so we continue to design a liveable city where future generations can continue to live authentic and meaningful lives. This is an exciting opportunity to join our team and be a bigger part of our amazing city!§ § § §Adelaide Aquatic Centre, operated by City of Adelaide, offers a wide range of facilities for the community including a fitness centre, recreational and dive pools, spa, sauna, steam room, swim shop and a café. The Centre, located in beautiful North Adelaide has easy access to public transport and all day free parking.§ § § §About the Opportunity § §The Adelaide Aquatic Centre is currently on the lookout for new talent to join the team on a casual basis. We are seeking individuals who have an interest in being a Swimming Instructor within our Aquatic Centre. A requirement for this role is to have the following; Teacher of Swimming & Water Safety, and CPR Certificate. Ideally you will have experience in delivering a high level of customer service, excellent communication skills with the ability to remain patient, and be able to achieve positive learning outcomes with individuals of all ages. § § § §This opportunity would require you to be available every Saturday and/or Sunday between 8:30am and 11:45am, generally over the set progressive 45-week program. In addition, you will also be required to be available at least one weekday shift between 9am to 11:30am and/or 4pm to 6:30pm every week over the course of each swimming term. Rosters are generally provided with set shifts for each 15-week trimester period in advance, however your flexibility is essential as rostered shifts may vary and at times you may be required to work with very little notice given. You could also have the opportunity to run birthday parties on Saturday and/or Sunday afternoons.§ § § §About You§ §To be successful in this role you will ideally have:§ §Demonstrated experience in an aquatic environment including the supervision and teaching of students at varying ages and abilities § §Experience in swimming programs§ §Teacher of Swimming and Water Safety Qualification§ §CPR Certificate§ § § §For Further Enquiries & How to Apply§ §All enquiries regarding this position will remain private and confidential and can be directed to Bronwyn Ambler, on §(08) 8203 7184§.§ § § §Please submit a Resume and a Cover Letter expressing the skills, experience and qualities you can bring to this position addressed to Bronwyn Ambler, Swim School Supervisor.§ § § §Please review the position description prior to submitting an application by following the prompts to apply or visit §www.cityofadelaide.com.au/careers§ § § §Applications close midnight §Tuesday 13 October 2020.§ § § §As part of the recruitment process candidates will be required to undertake a Working with Children Check, and a pre-employment medical and functional capacity assessment.§ § § §Aboriginal and Torres Strait Islander People are encouraged to apply.§§§§§

They will have demonstrated experience in managing a learn to swim centre, staff roster management, supporting the development of LTS Teachers, as well as a strong ability to multi-task, problem Clearance (mandatory criteria, must be valid at time of applying).§ §This is a full-time role (Tuesday – Saturday)§ § § §Job benefits and perks§ § § §Competitive salary + car§ §Send a cover letter and We are super proud and excited to be celebrating 10 years in Australia!§  §Who are we? And why should you work with us?§  §At Anytime Fitness Heidelberg we are a passionate and high performing team who never give up on achieving superior results. We are a family, and as a family we are dedicated to changing people’s lives. That’s why you’ll love joining us!  §  §Our mission is to create personalised human connections. We recognise and respect the uniqueness of everyone, and we deliver a personal experience for every person. We are committed to seeing you thrive and succeed in your new career with us. §  §What’s in it for you?§  §An attractive remuneration package, including above industry award salary will be offered to the successful applicant. We want a career-minded sales driven individual in this position who has exceptional customer service skills, an awesome desire to succeed and learn, and understands that hard work will get you there. You will be part of the fitness industry’s most respected and awarded companies. This is a great opportunity for the right candidate to be absorbed in a culture of empowerment and growth as we continue to grow our brand in Heidelberg.   §  §The role?§  §As Club Manager you are critical to the success of the club as you are responsible for lead generation, driving membership sales and building an awesome club culture with our awesome member base!§  §You must be confident on the phone, have solid sales skills (but we will spend time training you), with a can-do attitude, and be able to work in a team environment. The critical skill is your ability to build rapport and deliver a premium level of customer service to every one of our members (and future members).§  §Beyond this, you will be required to:§ § § §Welcome new members, by providing detailed and encouraging on-boarding§  § § §Provide club tours to prospective members§  § § §Create and execute a monthly outreach program §  § § §Establish and maintain an effective referral program§  § § §Maintain accurate sales records§  § § §Be engaging on the telephone e.g. conducting telephone inquiries / follow up calls / answering customer care calls§  § § §Greet members and guests promptly, enthusiastically and with a smile to create a friendly and open atmosphere§  § § §Maintain a clean and safe club at all times§  § § §Process cash and card transactions with ease and confidence§  § §About you:§ § § §Passion for health and fitness§  § § §Strong customer service ethos, and sales philosophy§  § § §Proven track record in reaching and exceeding sales targets§  § § §Passion for building genuine relationships§  § § §Ability to multi-task and stay organized§  § § §Positive, motivating, and effective communication skills§  § § §Flexible to work days / evenings / Saturdays§  § § §Intermediate computer skills§  § § §Certificate III in Fitness (desirable) §  § § §Excellent personal presentation§  § § §Ability to work well in a team environment§  § § §Current First Aid Certificate (can apply for afterwards)§  § § §Police Check §  § § §Working with Childrens Check (can apply for afterwards)§  § §If this sounds like the ideal position for you, please apply now by submitting your up-to-date resume, along with a cover letter that highlights how your passion, and previous skills/experience align with what we are looking for in the ideal candidate.  §  §Only applicants successful in progressing to interview will be contacted. §§§§The application form will include these questions:§§Which of the following statements best describes your right to work in Australia?§Do you have experience in a sales role?§Do you have customer service experience?§Do you have a current Working With Children (WWC) Check?§§§

jobTitle: Swimming Instructor Job in Coffs Harbour & North Coast - SEEK
jobText: TXT/50673301.txt	§Swimming Instructor§§More jobs from this company§§§§§§§§§§§Job Description§§Job Header§§Swimming Instructor§§Advertiser: §YMCA§§More jobs from this company§§§§Job Information§§Job Listing Date§§2 Oct 2020§§Location§§Coffs Harbour & North Coast§§Work Type§§Casual/Vacation§§Classification§§Sport & Recreation§, §Coaching & Instruction§§§§§§Our Swimming Instructors at Bellingen YMCA are the aquatic artistes training the next generation of swimming superstars. Every day, they lead safe, stimulating and always-fun lessons that build confidence and capability in developing young people. As a Swimming Instructor at The Y, you won’t just be a strong swimmer. Because you’ll also be a strong communicator, and a dynamic leader – motivating and educating our guests to build strong, active and safe behaviours in the water. You’ll also assist our Swimming Coordinators in creating lesson plans, interacting with parents (including hosting Parent-Teacher Nights) and taking part in school swimming carnivals.§If you’re an safety-conscious ‘Aqua Expert’ with strong people skills and an infectious energy, you could be our next Swimming Instructor. If so, expect perks like flexible hours and free facility membership, and the support to build valuable people, leadership and life skills – all while you make a difference to your community.§Qualifications§ §CPR Certificate§ §Teacher of Swimming and Water Safety License§ §Working with Children Check§ §Y work with us?§ §Work within a supportive team environment§ §Room to learn and develop within the organisation§ §Flexible hours and arrangements, for a work-life balance that works for you§ §Awesome discounts on The Y services and products§ §Corporate health insurance cover to keep you healthy§ §§Who What Y?§The Y NSW is a profit-for-purpose organisation focused on healthy living, social impact and empowering young people. We operate 22 recreation centres, 63 out-of-school-hours care services, and two camping locations which employ 1,800 staff across NSW –  and fund our diverse range of enriching community programs.§We believe in building a diverse, inclusive workforce that reflects the communities we serve. We encourage people of all genders, ages, religions, disability, sexual orientation, family and caring responsibilities and cultures, including people of Aboriginal and Torres Strait Islander heritage, to apply.§Commitment to Safeguarding§ § The Y, including Boards of Directors, is committed to the safety and wellbeing of children and young people in accordance with our Safeguarding Children and Young People framework. The Y requires that all applicants undergo satisfactory screening prior to commencement, including but not limited to:§●      a national criminal history check;§●      an international criminal history check where applicants have worked overseas;§●      holding or obtaining a Working with Children Clearance/equivalent in accordance with state/ territory laws;§●      two reference checks. §Please note, the results of any National and International Police Check will only be used to assess your suitability to perform the role.§Any successfully appointed applicant will be required to adhere to the Safeguarding Children and Young People framework, which includes a thorough safeguarding children and young people induction and committing to upholding the safety and wellbeing of children and young people throughout their engagement with YMCA.§§§§Right to live and work§§You must have the§ right to live and work §in this location to apply for this job.§§§

We currently have two successful F45 studios in operation – F45 Cairns Southern Suburbs and F45 Cairns Northern Beaches and will be opening our third studio in Redlynch in September 2020. We have the following exciting opportunities available:§ §STUDIO MANAGER (Full Time)§ §F45 Cairns Northern Beaches§ §Put simply, the Studio Manager is the heart of our business! This key role is accountable for the day-to-day operations of the studio, maintaining the overall experience for clients, as well as supervising the team. The Studio Manager ensures all the pieces are accounted for and connected, and also work in partnership with other managers as well as the executive team, to ensure consistency and targets are met. The Studio Manager is also the primary driver of the local community and corporate marketing for the studio. Our ideal candidate will possess exceptional customer service and communication skills, thrive in a team-oriented environment and have an infectious passion (even obsession - we get it!) for fitness.§ §Position Requirements:§ § §2+ years experience in a supervisory or managerial role§ §Cert IV in Fitness § §Current First Aid and CPR certificates§ §Flexibility to work evenings, weekends, and holidays§ §Excellent organisational and leadership abilities§ §Sales and Marketing experience (desirable)§ §Please contact §aleilua@f45training.com.au§ to register your interest in this role and receive the application selection criteria.§ §GROUP FITNESS INSTRUCTORS (Casual) § §F45 Cairns Northern Beaches, F45 Cairns Southern Suburbs and F45 Cairns Redlynch§ §We are on the search for SUPERSTAR trainers to join our amazing team and complement our respected brand and image. We pride ourselves on cultivating an energetic, inclusive and supportive group training environment therefore we employ trainers based on their experience, personality & ability to command the room.§ §Position Requirements:§ § §Cert III in Fitness§ §Senior First Aid / CPR Certificates§ §Driver's Licence and personal vehicle§ §An ability to work flexible hours, including early mornings and weekends§ §A willingness to work across all locations (desirable)§ §Please contact §aleilua@f45training.com.au§ to register your interest in this role and receive the application selection criteria.§ § §§§§The application form will include these questions:§§Which of the following statements best describes your right to work in Australia?§Have you completed a qualification in fitness?§How many years' experience do you have in the sports & fitness industry?§§§

Our swim schools are an integral component of our operation, we offer family-friendly class times 7 days a week in our heated facilities that are open all year round.§  §About the role:§  §We are looking for someone with a strong work ethic and can-do attitude who has the flexibility to switch between the duties of Customer Service and Swim Teaching as required.   §  § §  §In the §Customer Service Attendant§ role, you will be working on reception, meeting and greeting prospective, new and existing customers and assisting them with their queries over the phone and in person. You will be up-selling our services, provide administrative support and manage Point Of Sales processes. We require the Customer Service Attendant to work quite autonomously and therefore we are looking for a self-driven individual who thrives on their interactions with our customers and is able to rely on their experience to problem solve where needed.§  § §  §For the §Swim Teaching§ component of the role, prior experience is preferred but not essential as formal training processes are in place. You will be conducting learn to swim lessons and programs which meet the individual needs of participants, asses children’s swimming capabilities and communicate with parents on their child’s progression.§  §Our expectations of you:§ § §We believe that fun and energy is contagious, and we are looking for you to share your can-do attitude with others in the workplace.  § §Embrace our key Rackley Swimming values: Reliability, ‘Yes’ attitude, child-focused, knowledgeable, loyal, enthusiastic and safety driven.§ §You are available for casual weekday hours and are also willing to work weekends.§ §You hold, or are willing to obtain: § §a blue card§ §CPR§ §First  Aid§ §Pool Lifeguard§ §Austswim Teacher of Swimming and Water Safety or Swim Australia Teacher§ § § §What do we offer?§ § §Personal development and cross-training opportunities§ §Fun, vibrant and supportive team culture§ §Generous staff discounts§ §To apply please attach a cover letter and resume to your online application. jobTitle: Fitness Professional (Personal Trainer) Job in Sydney - SEEK
jobText: TXT/50596147.txt	§Fitness Professional (Personal Trainer)§§More jobs from this company§§§§§§§§Job Description§§Job Header§§Fitness Professional (Personal Trainer)§§Advertiser: §Virgin Active§§More jobs from this company§§§§Job Information§§Job Listing Date§§19 Sept 2020§§Location§§Sydney§, §North Shore & Northern Beaches§§Work Type§§Casual/Vacation§§Classification§§Sport & Recreation§, §Fitness & Personal Training§§§§§§§§§  §    §    §      §Fitness Professional (Personal Trainer) §      §        §We are a globally recognised brand with over 233 clubs in 8 countries and more than 1 million members. As part of the Virgin Group founded by Sir Richard Branson, we opened our first club in Australia in 2008 and are building an unparalleled collection of iconic locations in Sydney and Melbourne. We continue to innovate by developing a more personalised gym, multi-boutique experience and mission to provide irresistible exercise experiences.§        §The gig:§        §You’ll deliver exceptional PT sessions with the uniqueness that’s given you a rock star following and leverage your personality to help members experience physical, mental and emotional breakthrough moments. You’ll be empowered to build true community.§        §All about you:§        §You’re a raw and magnetic personality with a rock star reputation and your Cert IV. jobTitle: Centre Manager - Seasonal Pools - Various sites Job in Bendigo, Goldfields & Macedon Ranges - SEEK
jobText: TXT/50582209.txt	§Centre Manager - Seasonal Pools - Various sites§§More jobs from this company§§§§§§§§§§Job Description§§Job Header§§Centre Manager - Seasonal Pools - Various sites§§Advertiser: §Belgravia Health & Leisure Group§§More jobs from this company§§§§Job Information§§Job Listing Date§§17 Sept 2020§§Location§§Bendigo, Goldfields & Macedon Ranges§§Work Type§§Full Time§§Classification§§Sport & Recreation§, §Management§§§§§§VIC, Bendigo 3550§ §Seasonal Outdoor Pool Manager for 4 facilities:§Brennan Park Swimming Pool§Marong Swimming Pool§Heathcote Swimming Pool§Long Gully Splash Park§§Opening dates 21st November 2020 - 21st March 2021§ §Make a real difference to the community with a great opportunity with a growing and entrepreneurial organisation. Enjoy a great working environment with full time roles available. § §The Company§ §Belgravia Leisure§ is part of the Belgravia Health and Leisure Group (BHLG) and is the fastest growing leisure organisation in Australia. Our core areas of business and facilities stewardship include health clubs, wellness and spa, golf, aquatic and sporting venues in 150 locations across Australia and New Zealand. § §We are in an exciting period of growth, and look to continue to diversify and deliver results while being a strong community citizen.  With an annual turnover in excess of $180m, the group are looking for the best and brightest to assist with taking the organisation into the future.§ §The Role§ §An exciting opportunity has arisen for a suitably qualified and experienced Centre Manager to lead the team to deliver exceptional customer experience on a full time fixed term basis. Responsible for the management of this fantastic facility, the team at the Centre and our local community, you are fully accountable for the Centre’s operational, financial and program deliverables. You will develop and execute plans through engagement with the Centre’s leadership team, key stakeholders and the local Council. With an experience in sales, financial and risk management, you will continue to drive the Centre’s overall success.§ §Key Accountabilities§Ensure the safety and well-being of visitors and employees through effective planning and oversight of polices, processes and procedures.§Coach and develop leaders to deliver on KPIs through engagement, performance planning and individual development plans.§Lead and drive a high performance community minded culture through highly visible and hands-on leadership and team engagement.§Achievement of budgeted performance targets.§Maintain a high value relationship with local Council§Implement a high value customer service proposition that addresses the needs of the client base.§Recruitment of energetic, diverse and passionate employees as required to compliment the team and the vision for the Centre.§Train staff as required to ensure that knowledge and capability are at the required levels to enable staff to carry out their work and achieve their objectives.§Identify staff and develop career progression paths that lead to transparent and effective succession decisions when required.§Maintain facilities to approved standards in line with contract requirements.§ §About You§ §You will be a up and coming leader, who drives with vision and energy. You are passionate about leisure, wanting to join a growing organisation. You will be able to share insights into how you have successfully shaped high performance teams into business actions. You can easily articulate the link between employee engagement and exceptional business performance.§ §Essential Skills and Qualifications:§A minimum 2 years’ experience in managing a similar leisure or aquatic facility§Highly developed communication skills with a flair for positive influencing and negotiating win-win outcomes§Sound knowledge of health and safety legislation§Experience in planning and execution of operational, financial and people plans to successful outcomes§Current CPR Certificate§Current First Aid Certificate (Level 2)§National Police Check§Working with Children Check§Legal working rights in Australia§Desirable:§Tertiary qualifications in a related field§Extensive experience (4 to 5 years) in Centre Management§ If you are a person who is passionate about leisure and wants to utilise your skills and experience in the leisure industry, we want to hear from you!§ §Click the Apply Now button !§ §Please include a COVER LETTER indicating your experience and the position title you are applying for. §Bendigo 3550 VIC§§§§
