jobTitle: Personal Trainer - Snap Fitness Rockhampton Job in Rockhampton & Capricorn Coast - SEEK
jobText: TXT/50547334.txt	§Personal Trainer - Snap Fitness Rockhampton§§More jobs from this company§§§§§§§§§§Job Description§§Job Header§§Personal Trainer - Snap Fitness Rockhampton§§Advertiser: §TBH Group§§More jobs from this company§§§§Job Information§§Job Listing Date§§10 Sept 2020§§Location§§Rockhampton & Capricorn Coast§§Work Type§§Contract/Temp§§Classification§§Sport & Recreation§, §Fitness & Personal Training§§§§§§§WHAT QUALIFICATIONS WILL I NEED?§ §To successfully apply for this role, you will need to obtain the following credentials;§ § § § § §     Cert IV in Fitness§ § § §     Current First Aid and CPR§ § § §     ABN & Public liability/professional indemnity insurance§ § § § §WHAT DOES THE CLUB OFFER?§ §You will be provided with quality leads and support for your business no matter what level of experience you have in the fitness industry, in a fair environment and supportive team.§ § § §Business Planning and Mentorship§ §Let us start your career by assigning you your own PT mentor to deliver an initial 1 week Business Development induction, 12 Week Training & Development program, and ongoing weekly Strategy Meetings. Trainers are also equipped with access to our Online Portal containing ready to use client and business management software, along with templates and resources to download for your PT business.§ § § §Affordable Business Model§ §We offer an initial build up phase to assist you in the early stages of growing your clientbase, along with a competitive rent rate making us one of the lowest cost contractor models in the industry. We also have career progression opportunities for PT’s looking to advance into paid management roles within our group locally or even nationally.§ § § §Fair Member Ratio§ §We operate in a small box community based gym, meaning we only hire trainers to meet our qualified lead demands. We provide a member to trainer ratio of 300: 1 giving our team equal share to build long term client bases. We also assist our trainers with getting clients by selling new member PT introduction packs, providing access to our member database, and including our PT’s into club social media campaigns.§ § § §WHAT CAN YOU EARN?§ §As a business owner you will have the freedom to charge your own rates and set your own training packages with the minimum session rate starting at $1/min.§ §Earning capacity in this role is unlimited as the more sessions you service the more money you will make, with the average trainer’s income around $50-80K per annum.§ § § §WHAT IS THE CLUB LOOKING FOR?§ §Our team is seeking a fitness professional who is ready to commence a long-term career in our club. To be successful in this model you will need to be competent in the following areas;§ § § § § §     Open to providing new member orientations and training sessions§ § § §     Ability in running small group training sessions§ § § §     Open to contribute and participate in club activities and campaigns§ § § §     Passionate about health and fitness and workout regularly§ § § §     Enthusiastic and not afraid to approach people§ § § §     Exceptional customer service, communication and sales skills§ § § §     Ability to build and manage a business and be open to further learning§ §§§§The application form will include these questions:§§Which of the following statements best describes your right to work in Australia?§Have you completed a qualification in fitness?§§§

During these sessions, you will coach our members to push their limits, while delivering a 5-star service for our members. Our trainers take pride in our studio and the F45 brand and work to cultivate a great community vibe within our studio. Training and on-going development is provided to the successful candidate, with the potential for extra work in other F45 studios.§ §This casual role will involve the successful candidate running 4 - 8 weekly F45 Classes at the F45 Wanneroo studio. jobText: TXT/50545162.txt	§Personal Trainers - Authentic Personal Training§§More jobs from this company§§§§§§§§§§§Job Description§§Job Header§§Personal Trainers - Authentic Personal Training§§Advertiser: §HealthyPeople§§More jobs from this company§§§§Job Information§§Job Listing Date§§10 Sept 2020§§Location§§Sydney§, §North Shore & Northern Beaches§§Work Type§§Contract/Temp§§Classification§§Sport & Recreation§, §Fitness & Personal Training§§§§§§Since the reopening of our studio after COVID-19 restrictions, we have been struggling to keep up with the demand for our now preferred boutique fitness offering.§ §With a lot of planning and excellent execution throughout the COVID-19 pandemic, Authentic Personal Training has grown its business at record levels throughout 2020. § §Going against the grain of many fitness employers, the team has had safe, solid and guaranteed employment this year.§ §If your gym has left you without work and you are looking to join an organisation that always has an eye on the future, then this could be the role that you are looking for.§ §We want you to become the best trainer you can with the opportunity to join the team at one of Sydney's leading health and fitness studios.§ § §No rent, no contracts and no client paperwork!§ §Freedom to create your own programs for every member§ §Guaranteed income from day 1§ §A fun social work environment offering flexible hours and a clear career path§ §About the business§ §We are The Lower North Shores leading and most respected Personal Training studio. § § §The perfect combination of highly motivated, educated & committed Personal Trainers§ §A studio space that provides the best possible environment for members to achieve positive lifestyle change, our community is unmatched in the area.§ §We are not a franchise and this is not a cookie-cutter approach to health and fitness. As a result, we are very selective about recruiting our new teammates; they must share our same passion & values for helping others and enjoy their own personal growth.§ §About the role§ § §At Authentic PT, you will have the FREEDOM to design your own programs whilst not having to worry about overheads. § §Our supportive, hands-on owner will not only mentor you throughout your employment but help you achieve personal and professional goals.§ §This is a role that offers a clear career pathway in a business looking to expand.§ §Benefits and perks§ § §Being part of a team that learns, grows and develops TOGETHER§ §An owner that INVESTS in your career development§ §Guaranteed INCOME from day 1§ §What we need§ § §Current Cert 4 in PT and First Aid Certificate§ §Humble, authentic and hungry to grow both personally and professionally§ §A passion for helping people and an enthusiasm towards your own health and fitness§ §A strong belief in the studio values and community§ §If you do not think the above is for you then please do not apply. § §If you think you can thrive in an environment like this, then please §APPLY NOW.§ § §Send your CV and cover letter via the 'Apply' button.§§§§

jobText: TXT/50558732.txt	§Seasonal Outdoor Pool Lifeguard§§More jobs from this company§§§§§§§§Job Description§§Job Header§§Seasonal Outdoor Pool Lifeguard§§Advertiser: §YMCA Victoria§§More jobs from this company§§§§Job Information§§Job Listing Date§§14 Sept 2020§§Location§§Shepparton & Goulburn Valley§§Salary§§RE Grade 3: $21.97 per hour + super (25% loading)§§Work Type§§Part Time§§Classification§§Sport & Recreation§, §Other§§§§§§§§§  §    §    §      §Seasonal Outdoor Pool Lifeguard §      §      §      §        §At the Y, we believe in the power of inspired young people. A community not-for-profit organisation with 17 million participations annually across Australia. 8,000 staff and volunteers serve at more than 150 locations every day. We partner with government and private capital to deliver programs and services that include community recreation, adventure and stadium sports, camping, learn to swim, children's programs, early learning, youth services, retirement living, disability services and social enterprises.§        §About Moira Recreational Facilities§        §The Moira Recreational Facilities consist of nine facilities in total, made up of three all-year-round and six seasonal sites, namely:§        §          §Numurkah Outdoor Pool§          §Yarrawonga Foreshore Kiosk & Splash Park§          §Yarrawonga Outdoor Pool§          §Cobram Outdoor Pool§          §Nathalia Outdoor Pool§          §Strathmerton Outdoor Pool§        §        §Key Elements of the Role§        §As a Lifeguard with The Y, you understand that safety and fun go hand-in-hand. Our pools and recreation facilities are invaluable, inclusive, exciting spaces for sporty types – especially young people. But, they can’t exist if they aren’t safe. Which is exactly where you come in. You’ll join a team of responsible, approachable, confident swimmers in supervising our pools and surrounding areas. Together, you’ll uphold the highest standards of care and safety to make sure our swimmers have fun, stay active and gain confidence in the water.§        §This position is also available in a casual capacity.§        §The successful applicant will:§        §          §Provide adequate supervision of aquatic facilities to ensure the safety of all facility users§          §Maintain concentrated observation of pools and patrons to anticipate and respond to problems§          §Ensure facility rules are being obeyed whilst at the same time educating facility users about safe aquatic practices.§          §Carry out intervention and preventative action to ensure the safety and wellbeing of patrons, the facility and equipment§          §In conjunction with facility management facilitate the timely and safe use of water space, in clearly defined areas using appropriate signage§          §Undertake regular cleaning and tidying duties to ensure the maintenance of a safe environment for jobText: TXT/50555024.txt	§Personal Trainers | Senior & Junior | All Locations§§More jobs from this company§§§§§§§§§§Job Description§§Job Header§§Personal Trainers | Senior & Junior | All Locations§§Advertiser: §Surge Health & Fitness§§More jobs from this company§§§§Job Information§§Job Listing Date§§12 Sept 2020§§Location§§Perth§§Salary§§$70,000 - $100,000§§Work Type§§Contract/Temp§§Classification§§Sport & Recreation§, §Fitness & Personal Training§§§§§§Surge Fitness are now accepting applications for highly skilled and successful Fitness Professionals to join our teams at the following locations:§  §-Clarkson§  §-§Wanneroo§  §-Perth CBD Kings Square §  §-Perth CBD 240§  §Surge Fitness boasts some of the most exciting and diverse facilities WA has ever seen. § §  §Find out more about Surge Careers here: §https://www.surgefitness.com.au/careers/§  § §  §Whilst our industry was forced to a stand still, Surge Fitness has continued to innovate,  invest capital & give back to our loyal members. These initiatives are to ensure that we are consistently improving our on-going member services, whilst remaining at the forefront of health club services so that we can deliver on our goal of striving to be the very best health club operator In W.A’s metropolitan suburbs.§  §As a Surge Fitness Personal Trainer§, your career becomes an empowered lifestyle founded on maximizing both your personal and client performance. We promise our members a safe, caring and engaging environment to achieve their health and fitness goals. That is why we recruit fitness professionals who have the skills, qualifications and experience to guide them on their journey.§  §Our personal trainers benefit from:§ § §Initial and continued support on how to run your very own successful PT business.§ §Choose your own working hours!§ §Weekly mentoring to improve skillset and client retention.§ §Business Cards.§ §Web and In Club Profile.§ §Financial Planner§ §Internal and external marketing.§ §Opportunities to help out in our community.§ §Monthly/Quarterly workshops to enhance team building & member experience.§ §Access to gain on-going qualifications and further education through our network of affiliates.§ §Prime/Strive Strength equipment, the only health club in Australasia to stock the complete range.§ §Low start-up commitment and generous build-up period.§ §Opportunity for Junior PTs currently or recently completing certification to join our Junior Trainer program and gain experience in club trainer roles. § §Create your own hours and grow your own business.§ §Complimentary gym membership for you and a family member.§ §Access to industry partner discounts and staff benefits.§ §As an industry leader, Surge Fitness is a proud affiliate and host of several recognised industry partners including Mike Boyle Strength and Conditioning, Studio Pilates, FTI, TRX, Mike Finch Animal Flow, Les Mills, Jill Miller, Yoga Training Australia, Martin Rooney Training for Warriors and many more.§ § §  §Successful candidates will also have the opportunity to apply for coaching roles for our  “S Connect” latest functional team training Movement and 8 Week Challenge. §  § §  §Minimum Criteria:§ § §Certificate lll/IV Fitness§ §HLTAID001 Provide cardiopulmonary resuscitation; and§ §HLTAID002 Provide basic emergency life support.§ §Fitness Australia/ Network Registrations or alternative§ §ABN§ §Relevant business insurance and public liability§ §Relevant certification and qualification for specialized services§ §Must be willing to complete a practical assessment and provide a thorough business plan to be considered for final interview stage.§ §APPLY:§  §So if you want to be part of an innovative, fun and exciting brand leader that is more than just fitness, then please provide your resume and cover letter today!§  §We encourage enquiries! Please direct any questions and enquiries to your club of choice:§  §Clarkson:§  §Jakeb: fit.clarkson@surgefitness.com.au§  §Wanneroo: §  §Simon: fit.drovers@surgefitness.com.au§  §Perth CBD: §  §Viresh §fit.ks3@surgefitness.com.au§  §      §§§§The application form will include these questions:§§How many years' experience do you have as a personal trainer?§Have you completed a qualification in fitness?§Which of the following First Aid accreditations do you currently hold?§Are you currently registered with any of the following fitness boards?§Do you have an Australian Business Number (ABN)?§§§Right to live and work§§You must have the§ right to live and work §in this location to apply for this job.§§§

jobTitle: Swim Coach (Junior Development) Job in Brisbane - SEEK
jobText: TXT/50564746.txt	§Swim Coach (Junior Development)§§More jobs from this company§§§§§§§§§§§Job Description§§Job Header§§Swim Coach (Junior Development)§§Advertiser: §Marist College Ashgrove§§More jobs from this company§§§§Job Information§§Job Listing Date§§14 Sept 2020§§Location§§Brisbane§, §CBD & Inner Suburbs§§Work Type§§Part Time§§Classification§§Sport & Recreation§, §Coaching & Instruction§§§§§§Established in 1940, Marist College Ashgrove is a day and boarding school for boys located in the suburb of Ashgrove, six kilometres from the Brisbane CBD.  The College has a proud history of educating boys in the Marist tradition as well as, supporting them grow into young men and achieve their personal best.§ §In October 2015, the College opened its brand new 50m 10 lane swimming complex and the opportunity has now arisen for Junior Development Swim Coach.  The role will involve developing the Marist College Ashgrove junior squad.  Our coaches are a team of qualified and dedicated professionals who are committed to training swimmers to achieve strong results at State and National level.§ §The successful applicant will be an experienced, reliable, vibrant and enthusiastic coach with an excellent understanding of swimming to work closely with our Head Coach. § §The Position§ §We are seeking applicants who enjoy swimming, love working with children through to young adults and want to teach the skills and attributes of competitive swimming and water safety to others. The successful applicant will demonstrate the ability to communicate and interact effectively with swimmers that have a diverse range of ages, abilities, and needs.  This position will be a full time contract position for a period of three years.§ §MCA Swimming offers a squad program focused on excellence in technique.  Demonstrating the ability to work effectively both independently and as a strong and valuable part of the team, you will develop seasonal and training plans that show progression for swimmers through the levels.  Duties will include teaching and coaching all levels of swimmers; planning junior squad sessions; assisting the head coach with intermediate and senior squads as required; attending club nights and local swim meets.  A broad knowledge of pool plant operation and maintenance is required.§ §This position is expected to start as soon as possible or at a negotiated start date. This is a part-time 25 hours per week ongoing role.  This position will be paid $30.00 per hour plus super.§ §Key Responsibilities§:§ §Teaching and coaching all levels of swimmers§ § §Establish and maintain positive, professional communication with broader College community§ §Develop a seasonal plan and calendar of meets in conjunction with the Head Coach§ §Assisting in the development and coordination of the Marist College AIC and Club swim programs§ §Conduct training before and after school and on weekends (opening and closing facilities as required).§ §Assisting the Head Coach with intermediate and senior squads as required§ §Have a working knowledge of Workplace Health and Safety in relation to coaching and pool maintenance§ §Attending Friday night AIC swim meets§ §Attending club nights and local swim meets§ §Assisting in the maintenance of pool surrounds and equipment§ §Ensure a safe and efficient squad program within College guidelines§ §Actively promote the squad program and participation in the Swimming Club.§ §Some administration in conjunction with the Swim Administration assistant§ § § §Qualifications§:§ § §The following qualifications are required for the position:§ § §Development License (Previously Bronze License)§ §Must hold a current First Aid Certificate (including CPR)§ §Working with children check§ §Must have a strong understanding of the technical aspects of competitive strokes and be knowledgeable in the area of skills – Starts, Turns and Finishes.§ §Must be confident in developing a program that caters for the needs of both school and club swimmers.§ § §Knowledge and Experience:§ §The following knowledge and experience is required in this role:§ § §Previous experience working in the swim school industry in a comparable role§ §Ability to program and conduct squad sessions across all levels§ §Energetic, innovative and decisive coaching delivering outstanding customer service§ §Excellent verbal communication skills§ §An understanding of WHS and public safety applications within your facility§ § §All applicants must hold a Blue Card issued by Blue Card QLD.§ §Applicants should address the criteria above in their application.§ §Applicants will receive a confirmation email confirming the receipt of their application (please check your junk folder if needed).§ §Applications close Friday 2 October at 12.00 pm midday.§ §Marist College Ashgrove is a non-smoking workplace.§ §All candidates will be required to undergo a National Police Check as part of the recruitment process.§ §Once you have clicked the §Apply§ button on our website or the §Apply For This Job§ button on Seek, please continue to scroll down on this page to complete your application.§ §Download the MCA Application form §here§.§ §Download the Position Description §here§.§ §Enquiries should be addressed to:§ §James Boyce§ §Head Swim Coach§ §Marist College Ashgrove§ §Ph §0429 552 044§ §boycej@marash.qld.edu.au§ §Please note that applications from agencies will not be considered at this time.§ § §§§§Right to live and work§§You must have the§ right to live and work §in this location to apply for this job.§§§

jobText: TXT/50608108.txt	§Learn to Swim Instructor§§More jobs from this company§§§§§§§§Job Description§§Job Header§§Learn to Swim Instructor§§Advertiser: §Sam Riley Training and Development§§More jobs from this company§§§§Job Information§§Job Listing Date§§22 Sept 2020§§Location§§Brisbane§, §Northern Suburbs§§Salary§§$25 - $29.99 per hour§§Work Type§§Casual/Vacation§§Classification§§Sport & Recreation§, §Coaching & Instruction§§§§§§Sam Riley Swim Schools §Mount Gravatt East and North Lakes § §The team at Sam Riley Swim Schools Mount Gravatt East and North Lakes are looking for new and experienced instructors with energy and enthusiasm to join the team. The successful candidates will be provided with ongoing training and support from our Management and Senior Teaching Team.  § §Our Learn to Swim program is recognised as an industry leader and our aim is to maintain an environment for children to learn-to-swim that is fun, happy, stimulating and encouraging; one that will keep kids smiling while learning a lifelong skill.  Hours vary depending on applicant's ability and availability.§ §Shifts are from Monday to Friday; morning shifts approximately 8.30am to 11.00am and afternoon shifts from 3.30pm to 6.00pm. §Applicants must be available to work on one weekend morning approximately 7.00am11.30am§ §Selection Criteria §This is employer is an Austswim Registered Swim School To be considered for this position, you must be able to meet the following selection criteria: § §Essential:§ - §Note some qualifications can be obtained on commencement § § §Positive Notice Blue Card - Must have Prior to commencement § §Provide CPR § §AUSTSWIM Teacher of Swimming and Water Safety  § §Desirable§ § §Competitive swimming background § §AUSTSWIM Teacher of Infant and Preschool Aquatics § §AUSTSWIM Competitive Strokes§ §AUSTSWIM Inclusive Aquatics/ Learners with Disability§ §Experience in similar role or working in an aquatic facility for a minimum of 6 months§ § §Please forward applications to Tay Deadman – §taylord@srss.info§ § §Only applicants with the right to work in Australia should apply for these positions§§§§The application form will include these questions:§§Which of the following statements best describes your right to work in Australia?§§§

jobTitle: Horse Strapper Job in Brisbane - SEEK
advertiser: Cherbon Waters Equestrian Centre Pty ltd
jobText: TXT/50597021.txt	§Horse Strapper§§More jobs from this company§§§§§§§§Job Description§§Job Header§§Horse Strapper§§Advertiser: §Cherbon Waters Equestrian Centre Pty ltd§§More jobs from this company§§§§Job Information§§Job Listing Date§§20 Sept 2020§§Location§§Brisbane§, §CBD & Inner Suburbs§§Work Type§§Part Time§§Classification§§Sport & Recreation§, §Coaching & Instruction§§§§§§Happy Horses§Friendly Culture§New Facilities§Cherbon Waters is a family-owned Equestrian and Wedding Centre at Burbank on Brisbane’s Southeast. On average we are home to 35 – 40 spoilt, happy and content horses. We offer all levels of English style tuition as well as trail ride and horse experiences for the general public. We are open Monday to Thursday until around 9 pm, and Saturday and Sunday till 6 pm.§We operate on two shifts – morning and afternoon shift. We have a team of 12 including; Managers, Head Instructor, Instructors, Strappers, Gardeners, and a Handyperson. Our horses are happy and friendly; they are easy to care for and loved by all of us because they are part of our family.§Due to a growing business, we are looking for fellow horse lovers to join our team, and we can offer a range of options from casual to permanent/part-time. As a Strapper, you are responsible to bring horses in from the paddocks, tack them with saddles etc., keep the stables clean, assist trail riders with basic tuition and mounting, preparation and feeding of horses, general maintenance of equipment §You will need;§Experience working with horses (official or passion)§Drivers licence and your own vehicle§Be available for weekend and night work until 10 pm§This is a rare opportunity to join one of Brisbane’s leading centres. If you are looking for a career working with horses and have experience handling, so don’t miss your chance and apply today. Please include your resume outlining your experience working/handling horses, and your availability.§Also looking for instructors-contact us for more details.§ § §§§§The application form will include these questions:§§Do you have a current Australian driver's licence?§§§

jobTitle: Personal Trainers - Platinum One St Leonards Job in Sydney - SEEK
jobText: TXT/50573295.txt	§Personal Trainers - Platinum One St Leonards§§More jobs from this company§§§§§§§§§§§Job Description§§Job Header§§Personal Trainers - Platinum One St Leonards§§Advertiser: §HealthyPeople§§More jobs from this company§§§§Job Information§§Job Listing Date§§15 Sept 2020§§Location§§Sydney§, §North Shore & Northern Beaches§§Work Type§§Contract/Temp§§Classification§§Sport & Recreation§, §Fitness & Personal Training§§§§§§ §Has exercise/fitness always been a major factor in your life?§ §Do you want to work in a team of dedicated and passionate individuals?§ §Are you driven to help others embrace exercise and change their lives for the better?§ §ABOUT US§ §Platinum One was created to make a difference to our clients, to our trainers and to the fitness industry. We passionately believe in empowering our clients to become as strong, confident, happy and proud of themselves as possible. § §The fitness industry can focus too often on looking the part - losing weight through any means necessary, and working trainers into the ground to help clients do so.  There is a focus on clients as a number, rather than genuinely caring about helping them.§ §That's why we're here. We want to be that change in people's lives - for our clients and the entire team.§ §Our trainers care about every single client in this studio. They support each other and they look to grow both as individuals and as a team. As a result, our clients receive excellence as soon as they walk in the door, from a team of trainers that is committed to creating a community here that changes lives for the better.§ §JOIN OUR TEAM§ §We are looking to fill one key Personal Trainer position.§ §Help our clients overcome their issues with health, food and confidence to become proud of themselves and happy with who they are! § § §Experience in personal training is NOT essential as long as you have the right attitude and values§ §We provide a program to ensure our Trainers are excellent, and on-going support and growth to carve a career in fitness§ §WHAT WE ARE LOOKING FOR§ § §Personal Training qualifications§ §Genuine desire to make a real difference§ §Commitment to your own growth and development § §A desire to be a part of something more than yourself§ §No fear of hard work§ §APPLY TODAY§ §Submit your cover letter and CV to Aidan at Platinum One via the APPLY button.§§§§

jobText: TXT/50557573.txt	§Activities Officer - Tamworth§§More jobs from this company§§§§§§§§Job Description§§Job Header§§Activities Officer - Tamworth§§Advertiser: §Police Citizens Youth Clubs NSW Ltd§§More jobs from this company§§§§Job Information§§Job Listing Date§§14 Sept 2020§§Location§§Tamworth & North West NSW§§Work Type§§Casual/Vacation§§Classification§§Sport & Recreation§, §Coaching & Instruction§§§§§§§§§  §    §      §      §        §Activities Officer - Tamworth §        §          §PCYC NSW is a charity empowering young people to reach their potential through Police and community partnerships. For more than 83 years, PCYC has building capacity in the communities we serve across regional and metropolitan NSW. PCYC is an inclusive organisation, striving to service the broad sport and recreational needs of all community members in the 65 locations in which we operate.§Working closely with Police and volunteers, our staff contribute to the positive development of over 70,000 youth members through mainstream sport, recreation, education, leadership and cultural activities. PCYC provides pathways to for athletes to participate in elite competition and opportunities for leadership, development, employment and coaching opportunities for young people. PCYC also works with vulnerable youth with a specific focus on breaking the cycle of disadvantage through targeted crime prevention, vocational education, youth capacity building and social responsibility programs. Working at PCYC is an opportunity to contribute to the local community and improve outcomes for many people young people across NSW§          §            §Casual§            §$23.78 per hour + loading§          §          §Do you enjoy variety from reception and administration to sports activities with children and young people? This is just what you have been looking for. COME AND JOIN US!!§          §We get young people active in life§We develop their skills, character and Leadership§We reduce and prevent crime by and against young people§www.pcycnsw.org.au§        §        §        §      §    §  §§§PCYC NSW is a charity empowering young people to reach their potential through Police and community partnerships. For more than 83 years, PCYC has building capacity in the communities we serve across regional and metropolitan NSW. PCYC is an inclusive organisation, striving to service the broad sport and recreational needs of all community members in the 65 locations in which we operate.§Working closely with Police and volunteers, our staff contribute to the positive development of over 70,000 youth members through mainstream sport, recreation, education, leadership and cultural activities. PCYC provides pathways to for athletes to participate in elite competition and opportunities for leadership, development, employment and coaching opportunities for young people. PCYC also works with vulnerable youth with a specific focus on breaking the cycle of disadvantage through targeted crime prevention, vocational education, youth capacity building and social responsibility programs. Working at PCYC is an opportunity to contribute to the local community and improve outcomes for many people young people across NSW§ § §Casual§ §$23.78 per hour + loading§ §Do you enjoy variety from reception and administration to sports activities with children and young people? jobTitle: Learn to Swim Teacher and Swim Coach Job in Brisbane - SEEK
jobText: TXT/50573381.txt	§Learn to Swim Teacher and Swim Coach§§More jobs from this company§§§§§§§§Job Description§§Job Header§§Learn to Swim Teacher and Swim Coach§§Advertiser: §Multi Level Sports§§More jobs from this company§§§§Job Information§§Job Listing Date§§15 Sept 2020§§Location§§Brisbane§, §CBD & Inner Suburbs§§Salary§§$25 - $34.99 per hour§§Work Type§§Casual/Vacation§§Classification§§Sport & Recreation§, §Coaching & Instruction§§§§§§Shelly's Swim School located at Yeronga and Dunlop Park pool is expanding. We have a family friendly, fun environment which offers a number of a programs to the community.§ §We are currently seeking a Swim Coach and Learn to Swim Teachers who are fun, friendly, flexible, passionate and reliable who are available to work one or all of the following shifts:§ §Monday to Friday 8.00am to 12.00pm and 3.00pm to 6.00pm and; § §Saturday or Sunday 7.00am to 12.00pm§ §During term 1 and 4 we also run a school swimming program from 9.00am to 2.30pm.§ §As an employee of the complex your key accountabilities will include but are not limited to:§ §• Provide instruction and teaching for Learn to Swim lessons, and/or coaching Squads.§ § • Act as a member of the Learn to Swim team and assist in advising matters to do with swimming instruction/coaching and other appropriate matters.§ §• Be responsible for the effective and efficient implementation of the programs and policies of the Complex and Learn to Swim school, and to ensure the resources are most effectively deployed.§ §• Ensure that all reported hazards are eliminated as soon as possible and/or securely guarded and patrons warned of their existence and that any perceived health or safety risk or necessary repairs to premises, plant or equipment are reported to the Operations Manager verbally and in writing.§ § • Supervise aquatic facilities and maintain observation of pools and patrons to ensure the safety of all users and respond to emergency situations.§ §• Provide First Aid treatment and administer CPR with a quick response to incident/injury, coordinating emergency services as required.§ §• While Management strives to provide a friendly and safe work environment, all staff are required to play an active role in identifying potential safety issues which may cause injury or illness to staff or patrons. Such issues should be brought to the attention of your immediate supervisor to enable prompt action.§ §• Compliance with administration and organisational policies and procedures and legislative requirements, especially WHS.§ §• Compliance and adherence to the Multi Level Sports Code of Conduct and any applicable related policies and procedures.§ §The successful applicant will enjoy the benefits of the Aquatic Facilities and receive discounts on stock and programs. We also provide extensive training programs and courses.§ §You will need to have the following to apply for this role:§ § §Austswim Teacher of Swimming and Water Safety or ASCTA or willing to obtain before commencement of employment. § § Austswim Infants and Pre school  or Competitive Strokes (desirable)§ §Up to date CPR; and§ § Positive Blue Card prior to commencement of job§ §If you would like to apply for this role and be a part of an award winning team, please email your resume and cover letter to megan@yerongaswimming.com.au including your availability.§ §Successful applicants will be contacted directly§§§§The application form will include these questions:§§Which of the following First Aid accreditations do you currently hold?§Do you have a current Working With Children (WWC) Check?§Which of the following AUSTSWIM training courses have you completed?§§§

jobText: TXT/50589559.txt	§Learn to Swim Instructor - Casual§§More jobs from this company§§§§§§§§Job Description§§Job Header§§Learn to Swim Instructor - Casual§§Advertiser: §Blacktown City Council§§More jobs from this company§§§§Job Information§§Job Listing Date§§18 Sept 2020§§Location§§Sydney§, §Parramatta & Western Suburbs§§Work Type§§Casual/Vacation§§Classification§§Sport & Recreation§, §Coaching & Instruction§§§§§§§§§  §    §    §      §Learn to Swim Instructor - Casual §      §        §Blacktown is a vibrant city located in the very heart of Greater Sydney, half-way between Sydney City and the Blue Mountains. It is a city of ambition and excitement. With a total of 48 residential suburbs, and population of 395,000 coming from more than 180 different birthplaces, Blacktown City is one of the most diverse communities in Australia.§        §Working in Blacktown City provides a wealth of professional opportunities. Blacktown City Council is the largest Council in New South Wales, 4th largest in Australia and a leader in the development of the Western Sydney region. With almost unmatched growth expected over the next 25 years, we are on an exciting journey of transformation to prepare for a population of more than 550,000. There has never been a more exciting time to join one of Sydney’s most dynamic and high-performing Councils as we continue to deliver outstanding levels of service for our proud and diverse community and prepare our great city for the future.§        §Position Purpose§        §We are looking for enthusiastic individuals to join the team as a Casual Learn to Swim Instructor.§        §The role highlights are:§        §          §You get to be in the pool§          §You teach life skills§          §Penalty rates apply for weekend work.§        §        §If you have an AUSTSWIM Certificate or Swim Australia Certificate and love working with children then this is the role for you!§        §About the opportunity§        §Key Venues consists of 10 of Council’s premier sport and leisure facilities. We deliver first class activity and program choice, we promote Blacktown City as the leader in sport, recreation and leisure and we give every visitor and customer a safe and memorable experience. Our values are team work, customer focus, innovation and commitment to safety.§        §The learn to swim program is held at 5 aquatic venues, Blacktown Aquatic Centre, Blacktown Leisure Centre Stanhope, Charlie Lowles Leisure Centre Emerton, Mount Druitt Swimming Centre and Riverstone Swimming Centre. Expressions of Interest are being sought for enthusiastic Learn to Swim Instructors to apply to the venue of their choice.§        §Learn to Swim Instructors will deliver professional and safe learn to swim classes to students enrolled into the swim school program.§        §Qualifications and Experience§Essential:§        §          §            §              §                §Austswim Certificate – Teacher of Swimming and Water Safety or Swim Australia Teacher§                §Current CPR Certificate§                §Excellent oral communication§                §Excellent customer service§                §Current Working With Children Check.§              §            §          §        §        §Desirable:§        §          §            §Current First Aid Certificate§            §Pool Lifeguard Award§            §Oxygen Equipment Certificate§            §Coaching/teaching experience§            §Current driver’s licence§            §Knowledge of applicable legislation/regulations.§          §        §        §Salary and Conditions§        §The salary and conditions of employment are in accordance with Blacktown City Council’s Enterprise Agreement.§        §          §An hourly rate of $26.5316 (Grade 3, Level 1) per hour plus 25% casual loading as well as penalty rates apply for weekend shifts §          §Trainee rates apply for applicants under 19 years of age§          §Casual working hours§          §Employee benefits such as leave entitlements (where applicable), 9.5% employer superannuation contribution payable to the Local Government Superannuation Scheme, Fitness Passport and gym membership discounts, and social clubs.§        §        §This position has been identified as child related work, in accordance with the Child Protection (Working with Children) Regulation 2013. Therefore, your application must include a Working with Children Check (WWCC) number. For further information, go to www.newcheck.kids.nsw.gov.au.§        §Our Commitment to Safety§§        §Blacktown City Council is committed to safety. We have introduced alcohol and other drug testing at the pre-employment phase, and via a series of random tests, tests where there may be reasonable suspicion and / or post reportable incident testing for Council workers.§        §Position Description §        §Click §here§ §to view or download the position description.§            §        § §        §Closing Date:         20 November 2020§        §Contact Officer:     Katie Hagan §8822 6033§INTERNAL REF:     Casual§      §      §      §    §    §To apply visit the Council's website §www.blacktown.nsw.gov.au§  §§§Blacktown is a vibrant city located in the very heart of Greater Sydney, half-way between Sydney City and the Blue Mountains. It is a city of ambition and excitement. With a total of 48 residential suburbs, and population of 395,000 coming from more than 180 different birthplaces, Blacktown City is one of the most diverse communities in Australia.§ §Working in Blacktown City provides a wealth of professional opportunities. Blacktown City Council is the largest Council in New South Wales, 4th largest in Australia and a leader in the development of the Western Sydney region. With almost unmatched growth expected over the next 25 years, we are on an exciting journey of transformation to prepare for a population of more than 550,000. There has never been a more exciting time to join one of Sydney’s most dynamic and high-performing Councils as we continue to deliver outstanding levels of service for our proud and diverse community and prepare our great city for the future.§ §Position Purpose§ §We are looking for enthusiastic individuals to join the team as a Casual Learn to Swim Instructor.§ §The role highlights are:§ § §You get to be in the pool§ §You teach life skills§ §Penalty rates apply for weekend work.§ § §If you have an AUSTSWIM Certificate or Swim Australia Certificate and love working with children then this is the role for you!§ §About the opportunity§ §Key Venues consists of 10 of Council’s premier sport and leisure facilities. Our values are team work, customer focus, innovation and commitment to safety.§ §The learn to swim program is held at 5 aquatic venues, Blacktown Aquatic Centre, Blacktown Leisure Centre Stanhope, Charlie Lowles Leisure Centre Emerton, Mount Druitt Swimming Centre and Riverstone Swimming Centre. Expressions of Interest are being sought for enthusiastic Learn to Swim Instructors to apply to the venue of their choice.§ §Learn to Swim Instructors will deliver professional and safe learn to swim classes to students enrolled into the swim school program.§ §Qualifications and Experience§Essential:§ § § § § §Austswim Certificate – Teacher of Swimming and Water Safety or Swim Australia Teacher§ §Current CPR Certificate§ §Excellent oral communication§ §Excellent customer service§ §Current Working With Children Check.§ § § § § §Desirable:§ § § §Current First Aid Certificate§ §Pool Lifeguard Award§ §Oxygen Equipment Certificate§ §Coaching/teaching experience§ §Current driver’s licence§ §Knowledge of applicable legislation/regulations.§ § § §Salary and Conditions§ §The salary and conditions of employment are in accordance with Blacktown City Council’s Enterprise Agreement.§ § §An hourly rate of $26.5316 (Grade 3, Level 1) per hour plus 25% casual loading as well as penalty rates apply for weekend shifts § §Trainee rates apply for applicants under 19 years of age§ §Casual working hours§ §Employee benefits such as leave entitlements (where applicable), 9.5% employer superannuation contribution payable to the Local Government Superannuation Scheme, Fitness Passport and gym membership discounts, and social clubs.§ § §This position has been identified as child related work, in accordance with the Child Protection (Working with Children) Regulation 2013. Therefore, your application must include a Working with Children Check (WWCC) number. jobText: TXT/50609851.txt	§Learn to Swim Instructors§§Private Advertiser§§§§§§§§Job Description§§Job Header§§Learn to Swim Instructors§§Private Advertiser§§§§Job Information§§Job Listing Date§§22 Sept 2020§§Location§§Lismore & Far North Coast§§Salary§§From $24.41 per hours§§Work Type§§Part Time§§Classification§§Sport & Recreation§, §Coaching & Instruction§§§§§§We are seeking passionate and professional §Learn to Swim Instructors§ who are qualified to provide swimming lessons to groups, schools and individuals. The role also requires working closely with the Aquatics Coordinator and the Duty Supervisor to promote a positive experience for all aquatic facilities patrons.§We are looking for people to perform the following duties:§Delivers Learn to Swim classes§Ensures the safety of all students.§Provides direction and tuition to participants.§Delivers consistently high levels of customer satisfaction and teaching excellence.§What do we need from you:§Previous experience as a Learn to Swim instructor in an aquatic facility§Qualification in Teacher of Swimming and Water Safety, CPR and valid Working with Children Check§Demonstrate values (Passionate, Communicate, Respect, Strive)§Demonstrated strong teamwork and communication skills§Follow Defined WHS Policies and Procedures: Follow procedures for hazard identification and risk control, and raise WHS issues which need to be addressed§Maintain a professional standard of presentation, wearing appropriate attire in and out of the water§Provision of relevant qualifications prior to appointment to this position§Attend meetings and training sessions as required§Provide a reasonable timeframe when changing your start and or shift time§Be present and ready to work prior to the start of your shift, showing punctuality and being prepared and organisation§Permanent Part Time: §A range of hours are available over a Monday - Sunday roster. Minimum hours will apply and be determined on a case by case basis.§Hours will vary depending on the function/s being undertaken and the operational requirements of the facilities.§Hourly Rate:§ Ranging from $24.41 per hour + superannuation.§Closing date:§ Tuesday 6th October at 4:00pm§Contact§: For a confidential discussion or further information regarding this position please contact Heidi Craig, Aquatics Coordinator on §02 66255370§.§Pre-employment Screening§Due to the high level of trust placed in this role, an offer will be made subject to a series of satisfactory pre-employment checks including health assessments (includes drug test), reference checks, Working with Children Check and receipt of copies of relevant qualifications and reference checks.§Working with Children Check§In accordance with the requirement for ‘Working with Children' anyone starting a new, paid job in child-related work must apply for the Working with Children Check (WWCC). This is a requirement for this position and it is the responsibility of the successful applicant to have undertaken the WWCC and the ‘Clearance to Work with Children’ prior to commencement. For further information on how to apply please refer to http://www.kidsguardian.nsw.gov.au/Working-with-children/working-with-children-check§§§§The application form will include these questions:§§Which of the following statements best describes your right to work in Australia?§Do you have a current Working With Children (WWC) Check?§Which of the following First Aid accreditations do you currently hold?§Which of the following AUSTSWIM training courses have you completed?§Do you have a current Australian driver's licence?§§§

jobTitle: Personal Trainer - Vision Personal Training Bangor Job in Sydney - SEEK
jobText: TXT/50614108.txt	§Personal Trainer - Vision Personal Training Bangor§§More jobs from this company§§§§§§§§§§§Job Description§§Job Header§§Personal Trainer - Vision Personal Training Bangor§§Advertiser: §HealthyPeople§§More jobs from this company§§§§Job Information§§Job Listing Date§§22 Sept 2020§§Location§§Sydney§, §Southern Suburbs & Sutherland Shire§§Work Type§§Full Time§§Classification§§Sport & Recreation§, §Fitness & Personal Training§§§§§§ § §ABOUT THE ROLE§ §Be inspired at work by working in a great team and supportive culture! Vision Bangor has been inspiring the lives of trainers and clients for 15 years! Join a team of high performers that will help you be the best version of you. Our development program and mentoring support will ensure you are the best you can be! Whether you are an experienced trainer who wants the next step in your career, or you’re looking for a step in the industry, you bring the attitude and we will help with the rest.§ §Vision Bangor's§ goal is to change YOUR life by helping you change as many client’s lives as possible along the way. We are a family at Vision Bangor and always put our people first. Our trainers inspire their Clients through:§ § §One on One Personal Training and Group Training Sessions§ §Goal Setting and Nutrition Sessions§ §Present Educational Seminars§ §Being Role models§ §Having a Burning Desire to Develop and Grow into the VERY BEST version of themselves§ §We will take care of all the hard stuff so you can focus on getting clients great results.§ § §You won’t be required to pay rent.§ §Vision will look after all your tax obligations and insurances.§ §Vision will provide you with a full 2XU PT Uniform.§ §Casual and Permanent positions available depending on experience.§ §SKILLS AND EXPERIENCE§ §All applicants must have:§ § §Certificate IV in Fitness§ §A valid Working with Children Check (WWC)§ §A positive attitude and eagerness to grow and develop with us!§ §Want a CAREER not just a job§ §A genuine interest in understanding nutrition and macronutrients.§ §CAREER OPPORTUNITY§ §You will have the chance to work directly with Chris Jovcevski, Owner of the Studio. Over his 12 year career in the industry, he has personally helped over 100 trainers develop their careers in the fitness industry. He has developed 11 Senior Trainers, 9 Managers and 4 Franchise owners through Vision Bangor. He is genuinely passionate about growth and development, which is why he believes the best leaders develop from the ground up.§He lives and breathes health and fitness and is a great Role Model to help you develop you into your best version of you.§ §VISION CULTURE§ §Vision Bangor has an infectious culture, with positive mindset shifts and life-transformations as part of our day-to-day! At Vision, it is our culture that makes us unique. Our studio is filled with vibrant fitness enthusiasts striving to bring out the best in each other, encouraging us to reach our potential every single day.§ §TO APPLY§ §Please email your resume/contact details through to our studio director Chris.§§§§Right to live and work§§You must have the§ right to live and work §in this location to apply for this job.§§§

jobText: TXT/50532957.txt	§ATTN Personal Trainers - Work RENT FREE§§More jobs from this company§§§§§§§§§§§Job Description§§Job Header§§ATTN Personal Trainers - Work RENT FREE§§Advertiser: §HealthyPeople§§More jobs from this company§§§§Job Information§§Job Listing Date§§8 Sept 2020§§Location§§Sydney§, §CBD, Inner West & Eastern Suburbs§§Work Type§§Full Time§§Classification§§Sport & Recreation§, §Fitness & Personal Training§§§§§§We are completely changing the fitness industry! Will you be a part of it?§ § §Join a business that's striving to make a difference, not just a living§ §NO SALES § §Earn $45-$65 per session§ §NO RENT § §CLIENTS WAITING FOR YOU§ §The industry is changing and we're leading the way. Keen to actually make a difference? Join an organisation dedicated to sustainably changing the lives of our clients and our TRAINERS.§ §If you're just starting out as a PT and looking for a great place to learn and grow, come join our proud team at Get Going Personal Training! If you've been in the industry for a while, stop stressing about maintaining leads and clients and join a professional team.§ §Get out of the cutthroat environment of lead generation.§ §We'll provide you with the tools you need to build your client books to 30+ clients comfortably and quickly.§ §We Offer:§ § §4-Week training and mentoring program§ §Ongoing support and learning§ §Regular meetings§ §We build your clientele as quickly as your potential allows§ §Earn $45-$65 per session OR own your own Get Going.§ §Opportunities to grow into higher positions within the organisation§ §The chance for you to build and own your own business!§ §Your Role:§ §As a Mobile (Home) Personal Trainer, you will be one of our home training specialists, providing training programming, implementation and advice!§ § §Look after your own clientele § §Manage your own database and accounts§ §Continuous learning and development§ §Benefits & Culture§ §We have developed, and continue to develop, an extremely motivating and fun environment for all of our talent to learn and grow. We believe that in order to inspire your clients the way that you've always desired, you need a supportive group of individuals around you!§ §Do I need to be based in the location advertised to apply for this role?§ §Absolutely not! You can be located anywhere in AUSTRALIA§ §Is there room to progress with Get Going? § §Of course! We are a rapidly expanding young business, growing 500% in the last 12 months! With this growth, comes more responsibility - therefore opportunity!§ §I know there are no rent charges, but are there any upfront costs with Get Going? § §No. Get Going is paving a new path for trainers looking to break into this§competitive industry. We believe that providing the right environment starts with education, support and practice!§ §What makes Get Going a better place to work than its competitors? § §We aren't your average gym, we aren't your average studio and we sure as F*&! aren't your average mobile PT company! We pride ourselves on our team values, constant development and ability to produce sustainable results in our entire clientele. If you'd rather fight for every lead, be a lone wolf (or sheep) and become a generic 'PT' then Get Going ISN'T the place for you.§ §Requirements:§ § §Certificate IV in Health & Fitness (Personal Training)§ §Reliable car§ §First Aid and CPR§ §Generous availability§ §Positive attitude§ §Enthusiasm & self-motivation§ §Apply Now!§ §Send us your resume, cover letter and a bit about yourself via the APPLY button.§ §Or email Info@getgoingpt.com.au§§§§Right to live and work§§You must have the§ right to live and work §in this location to apply for this job.§§§

jobTitle: Personal Trainer - Snap Fitness Geraldton Job in Geraldton, Gascoyne & Midwest - SEEK
jobText: TXT/50547487.txt	§Personal Trainer - Snap Fitness Geraldton§§More jobs from this company§§§§§§§§§§Job Description§§Job Header§§Personal Trainer - Snap Fitness Geraldton§§Advertiser: §TBH Group§§More jobs from this company§§§§Job Information§§Job Listing Date§§10 Sept 2020§§Location§§Geraldton, Gascoyne & Midwest§§Work Type§§Contract/Temp§§Classification§§Sport & Recreation§, §Fitness & Personal Training§§§§§§§WHAT QUALIFICATIONS WILL I NEED?§ §To successfully apply for this role, you will need to obtain the following credentials;§ § § § § §     Cert IV in Fitness§ § § §     Current First Aid and CPR§ § § §     ABN & Public liability/professional indemnity insurance§ § § § §WHAT DOES THE CLUB OFFER?§ §You will be provided with quality leads and support for your business no matter what level of experience you have in the fitness industry, in a fair environment and supportive team.§ § § §Business Planning and Mentorship§ §Let us start your career by assigning you your own PT mentor to deliver an initial 1 week Business Development induction, 12 Week Training & Development program, and ongoing weekly Strategy Meetings. Trainers are also equipped with access to our Online Portal containing ready to use client and business management software, along with templates and resources to download for your PT business.§ § § §Affordable Business Model§ §We offer an initial build up phase to assist you in the early stages of growing your clientbase, along with a competitive rent rate making us one of the lowest cost contractor models in the industry. We also have career progression opportunities for PT’s looking to advance into paid management roles within our group locally or even nationally.§ § § §Fair Member Ratio§ §We operate in a small box community based gym, meaning we only hire trainers to meet our qualified lead demands. We provide a member to trainer ratio of 300: 1 giving our team equal share to build long term client bases. We also assist our trainers with getting clients by selling new member PT introduction packs, providing access to our member database, and including our PT’s into club social media campaigns.§ § § §WHAT CAN YOU EARN?§ §As a business owner you will have the freedom to charge your own rates and set your own training packages with the minimum session rate starting at $1/min.§ §Earning capacity in this role is unlimited as the more sessions you service the more money you will make, with the average trainer’s income around $50-80K per annum.§ § § §WHAT IS THE CLUB LOOKING FOR?§ §Our team is seeking a fitness professional who is ready to commence a long-term career in our club. To be successful in this model you will need to be competent in the following areas;§ § § § § §     Open to providing new member orientations and training sessions§ § § §     Ability in running small group training sessions§ § § §     Open to contribute and participate in club activities and campaigns§ § § §     Passionate about health and fitness and workout regularly§ § § §     Enthusiastic and not afraid to approach people§ § § §     Exceptional customer service, communication and sales skills§ § § §     Ability to build and manage a business and be open to further learning§ §§§§The application form will include these questions:§§Which of the following statements best describes your right to work in Australia?§Have you completed a qualification in fitness?§§§

No experience required - we'll give you all the support you need to become the best Trainer you can be.  § §As a trainer at Goodlife, you'll have access to:§ § §Ongoing mentoring & support from your Fitness Director§ §Industry-leading programs to help you get more clients§ §Premium equipment & facilities § §The support of a large, national brand§ §As a Personal Trainer with Goodlife, you'll have the chance to help change the lives of our members while working amongst a super passionate team! § §For unqualified professionals, opportunities exist in sales, reception, and management (experience required).§ §Not yet qualified and looking to study to become a Personal Trainer? §We encourage all aspiring Personal Trainers to apply!§ §Apply Now!§ §Send your application to the Fitness Director via the link below! §§§§Right to live and work§§You must have the§ right to live and work §in this location to apply for this job.§§§

jobTitle: Personal Trainer - Snap Fitness Beaudesert Job in Gold Coast - SEEK
jobText: TXT/50547295.txt	§Personal Trainer - Snap Fitness Beaudesert§§More jobs from this company§§§§§§§§§§Job Description§§Job Header§§Personal Trainer - Snap Fitness Beaudesert§§Advertiser: §TBH Group§§More jobs from this company§§§§Job Information§§Job Listing Date§§10 Sept 2020§§Location§§Gold Coast§§Work Type§§Contract/Temp§§Classification§§Sport & Recreation§, §Fitness & Personal Training§§§§§§§WHAT QUALIFICATIONS WILL I NEED?§ §To successfully apply for this role, you will need to obtain the following credentials;§ § § § § §     Cert IV in Fitness§ § § §     Current First Aid and CPR§ § § §     ABN & Public liability/professional indemnity insurance§ § § § §WHAT DOES THE CLUB OFFER?§ §You will be provided with quality leads and support for your business no matter what level of experience you have in the fitness industry, in a fair environment and supportive team.§ § § §Business Planning and Mentorship§ §Let us start your career by assigning you your own PT mentor to deliver an initial 1 week Business Development induction, 12 Week Training & Development program, and ongoing weekly Strategy Meetings. Trainers are also equipped with access to our Online Portal containing ready to use client and business management software, along with templates and resources to download for your PT business.§ § § §Affordable Business Model§ §We offer an initial build up phase to assist you in the early stages of growing your clientbase, along with a competitive rent rate making us one of the lowest cost contractor models in the industry. We also have career progression opportunities for PT’s looking to advance into paid management roles within our group locally or even nationally.§ § § §Fair Member Ratio§ §We operate in a small box community based gym, meaning we only hire trainers to meet our qualified lead demands. We provide a member to trainer ratio of 300: 1 giving our team equal share to build long term client bases. We also assist our trainers in getting clients by selling new member PT introduction packs, providing access to our member database, and including our PT’s into club social media campaigns.§ § § §WHAT CAN YOU EARN?§ §As a business owner you will have the freedom to charge your own rates and set your own training packages with the minimum session rate starting at $1/min.§ §Earning capacity in this role is unlimited as the more sessions you service the more money you will make, with the average trainer’s income around $50-80K per annum.§ § § §WHAT IS THE CLUB LOOKING FOR?§ §Our team is seeking a fitness professional who is ready to commence a long-term career in our club. To be successful in this model you will need to be competent in the following areas;§ § § § § §     Open to providing new member orientations and training sessions§ § § §     Ability in running small group training sessions§ § § §     Open to contribute and participate in club activities and campaigns§ § § §     Passionate about health and fitness and workout regularly§ § § §     Enthusiastic and not afraid to approach people§ § § §     Exceptional customer service, communication and sales skills§ § § §     Ability to build and manage a business and be open to further learning§ §§§§The application form will include these questions:§§Which of the following statements best describes your right to work in Australia?§Have you completed a qualification in fitness?§§§

jobText: TXT/50663814.txt	§Personal Trainers - Crunch Fitness Alexandria§§More jobs from this company§§§§§§§§§§§Job Description§§Job Header§§Personal Trainers - Crunch Fitness Alexandria§§Advertiser: §HealthyPeople§§More jobs from this company§§§§Job Information§§Job Listing Date§§1 Oct 2020§§Location§§Sydney§, §CBD, Inner West & Eastern Suburbs§§Work Type§§Contract/Temp§§Classification§§Sport & Recreation§, §Fitness & Personal Training§§§§§§Want to build your own successful fitness business in a place that supports your goals?§ §The explosive global brand §Crunch Fitness§ is now looking for passionate Personal Trainers who want to work for a global brand with great career potential!§ §We are world famous for fusing entertainment with fitness. We are all about FUN, and as a result, we provide an amazing work experience.§ §We are passionate about our purpose, we empower people to live out their dreams by helping them ‘perspire to greatness’.§ §As a Crunch Personal Trainer you’ll work under the rent-based model – That means you have the freedom to charge what you want for your sessions, and it’s all yours to keep!§ §If you are the right fit then we will provide you with the tools for success!§ §As one of our valued Trainers, you'll receive;§ § §Uncapped earning potential!§ §Access to an extensive client base to grow your business§ §State-of-the-art Equipment§ §A PT Supervisor to mentor you through your journey at Crunch§ §Business Development and Training opportunities§ §Flexible working hours§ §The chance to work amongst a great team who love to have FUN!§ §What we're looking for:§ § §Cert IV in Fitness (minimum qualification)§ §A drive to grow your business and achieve goals§ §Be passionate about helping people through their fitness journey§ §Strong customer service skills§ §Positive attitude§ §High sense of integrity and honesty§ §Effective time management§ §Values teamwork§ §Love having fun and trying new things!§ §If this sounds like you, APPLY NOW!§ §If you wish to know more about what Crunch can offer you, please visit our website (www.crunch.com.au) to learn more about what we are all about.§ §If you are what we are looking for we will contact you for an interview.§ §We look forward to hearing from you!§§§§§Right to live and work§§You must have the§ right to live and work §in this location to apply for this job.§§§

jobTitle: Personal Trainer - Sky Personal Training - Brookvale & Mona Vale Job in Sydney - SEEK
jobText: TXT/50535342.txt	§Personal Trainer - Sky Personal Training - Brookvale & Mona Vale§§More jobs from this company§§§§§§§§§§Job Description§§Job Header§§Personal Trainer - Sky Personal Training - Brookvale & Mona Vale§§Advertiser: §Sky Personal Training§§More jobs from this company§§§§Job Information§§Job Listing Date§§9 Sept 2020§§Location§§Sydney§, §North Shore & Northern Beaches§§Work Type§§Full Time§§Classification§§Sport & Recreation§, §Fitness & Personal Training§§§§§§ §We coach and develop people, we don't manage numbers§ §Work in our new and modern five-star studio§ §Rewards are well above industry average§ §About us§ §Based in Mona Vale on Sydney's stunning Northern Beaches, SKY Personal Training has built a reputation for improving the wellbeing of its clients through the development of tailored, healthy lifestyle plans that fit perfectly with needs of each and every individual.§ §The SKY PT brand is founded on ethics and integrity - we coach and develop people, we don't manage numbers. Of course results are important, but at SKY PT we believe that our clients and trainers should be recognized as one of the family.§ §About the role§ §For you to be successful with SKY PT you will already be familiar with our core values: You will have  a connection with your clients that ensures you are fully engaged with their goals and needs.§ §You will have a strong sense of working in a team-orientated community and demonstrate an empathetic approach to Personal Training that genuinely contributes to the wellbeing of others. SKY Personal Training is not just about getting results, it's about helping our customers achieve a work / life balance that enhances their lifestyle and encourages their efforts every step of the way.§ §What you can expect§ §At SKY we focus on 1-1 personal training. We operate in a five-star studio and enjoy a relationship with our clients that is second to none. The 2 successful new team members will add to our winning culture and be committed to inspiring others.§ §If you are an energetic, positive and experienced Personal Trainer, either looking for a sea-change or a career with a business that has more than 10 years experience in the fitness industry, you just may be what we are looking for.§ §Skills & Requirements§ §The minimum requirements for this role are:§ § §Certificate 3 & 4 in Personal Training§ §An above average level of fitness§ §An amazing positive and confident attitude and a warm and welcoming vibe§ §Nutritional qualification (preferred but not essential)§ §First Aid and CPR Certificate§ §NB - ABN and Insurance Cover is NOT REQUIRED§ §Hours & Salary§ §The position is full time and flexibility is key -  some early morning starts as well as late finishes can be expected as we like to ensure that we work around our clients schedules.§ §The rewards are well above industry average – a new, modern studio in the heart of Mona Vale & Brookvale, a negotiable remuneration package, the opportunity to work with an ambitious and motivated young team who will take a genuine interest in your future.§ §How to apply§ §If you believe that you have got what it takes and really want to make a difference to the wellbeing of others as well as improving your career – we would love to hear from you § §Please apply now or call Justin Ciabatti on §(02) 9999 1115§/ §0488 007 845§ §For more information www.skypt.com.au§§§§

jobTitle: Lifeguard - Lidcombe Job in Sydney - SEEK
jobText: TXT/50537166.txt	§Lifeguard - Lidcombe§§More jobs from this company§§§§§§§§§§Job Description§§Job Header§§Lifeguard - Lidcombe§§Advertiser: §Belgravia Health & Leisure Group§§More jobs from this company§§§§Job Information§§Job Listing Date§§9 Sept 2020§§Location§§Sydney§§Work Type§§Casual/Vacation§§Classification§§Sport & Recreation§, §Coaching & Instruction§§§§§§Great career paths and development with an entrepreneurial organisation§Free facility access §Enjoy a great work / life balance with mornings, evenings and weekend shifts§Multiple positions available §This is a great opportunity for qualified lifeguards who value water safety, §love working with people, who want to keep the community safe in our facilities§.§ §The Company§ §Belgravia Leisure§ is part of the Belgravia Health and Leisure Group (BHLG) and is the fastest growing leisure organisation in Australia. Our core areas of business and facilities stewardship include health clubs, wellness and spa, golf, aquatic and sporting venues in 150 locations across Australia and New Zealand. § §We are in an exciting period of growth, and look to continue to diversify and deliver results while being a strong community citizen.  With an annual turnover in excess of $180m, the group are looking for the best and brightest to assist with taking the organisation into the future.§ §The Role§ §We are gearing up for the upcoming peak seasonal period and are looking for enthusiastic, reliable and friendly §lifeguards§ to join the team. Our lifeguards will be responsible for the Day to Day Pool Operations within our facility and ensure that all areas both in and surrounding our pools is a safe and enjoyable environment for all patrons.§ §You will have a passion for safety around the water. You should be energetic, dynamic, outgoing and fun. You will need outstanding communication skills and a commitment to customer service excellence to ensure our patrons safely enjoy their visit every time.§ §Successful applicants will demonstrate the ability to communicate and interact effectively with students that have a diverse range of ages, abilities, cultures and needs. § §Skills & Attributes:§Excellent verbal communication skills§An understanding of OHS and public safety applications within your facility§Ability to work mornings, evenings and weekends§Ability to work effectively both independently and as a strong and valuable part of the team§Current First Aid (Level 2) & Current CPR Certificate§National Police Check§Current Pool Lifeguard Certificate§Previous experience and success in a comparable role is not essential but highly regarded§Current Pool Operations Certificate is not essential but highly regarded§ § If you are a passionate person who realises the tremendous opportunity that this role offers and want to utilise your skills and passion in an aquatic and leisure environment, §we want to hear from you!§ §Simply complete the application process by clicking the Apply Now button and we’ll be in touch.§ §Lidcombe 2141 NSW§§§§

jobTitle: Learn to Swim Instructor Job in Gosford & Central Coast - SEEK
jobText: TXT/50591500.txt	§Learn to Swim Instructor§§More jobs from this company§§§§§§§§§§Job Description§§Job Header§§Learn to Swim Instructor§§Advertiser: §Mingara§§More jobs from this company§§§§Job Information§§Job Listing Date§§18 Sept 2020§§Location§§Gosford & Central Coast§§Work Type§§Casual/Vacation§§Classification§§Sport & Recreation§, §Coaching & Instruction§§§§§§About Us§ §Mingara Recreation Club §is the Central Coast's premier lifestyle destination featuring great restaurants, entertainment & sporting & events facilities.§ §Mingara§ is well-known in the Central Coast community for living its vision '§to make a significant contribution to the quality of community life§'.  This vision pervades the Club's operations and as this vision is lived through our people, our product and the genuine support we provide to the community.§ § § §The Role§ §An exciting opportunity exists for casual learn to swim instructors to join our wonderful team at §Mingara Aquatics.§ § §At §Mingara Aquatics§, we love our learn to swim children to have a fun, educational experience. We value creativity, a passion for the industry, and a positive and caring attitude in all of our team members. If this sounds like you we would love to hear from you!§ § § §The main duties of this role will include:§ § §Develop, plan and conduct quality swimming lessons and group activities§ §Providing excellent customer service§ §Maintaining a safe work environment§ §Adhering to Royal Life, AUSTSWIM and Swimming Australia guidelines§ §Maintaining current qualifications§ §Promoting Aquatics Education programs in Mingara One§ §To be successful in this role, you will need:§ § §A passion for teaching children a valuable life skill§ §Flexible availability - including Monday to Sunday mornings and Monday to Friday afternoons§ §Excellent people and communication skills§ §Demonstrated ability to think on your feet and show initiative§ §It is essential that you have the following certifications:§ § §An AUSTSWIM Certificate of Teacher of Swimming and Water Safety §or§ another current learn to swim qualifications and willingness to obtain AUSTSWIM§ §An AUSTSWIM Certificate of Teacher of Infant and Preschool Aquatics (desirable)§ §Current CPR Certificate § §Current Working with Children Check or willingness to obtain§ §Available to work on weekends§ §Being part of the Mingara Employee team comes with other non-financial benefits including:§ § §Flexible hours§ §Free gym membership§ §A generous scholarship program to help employees achieve their set goal,§ §Ongoing training and opportunities§  § §If you would like to be a part of a fun and dynamic team, do not delay in submitting your application.§§§§

jobText: TXT/50625868.txt	§Casual Gymnastics Coaches§§More jobs from this company§§§§§§§§Job Description§§Job Header§§Casual Gymnastics Coaches§§Advertiser: §City of Canada Bay Council§§More jobs from this company§§§§Job Information§§Job Listing Date§§24 Sept 2020§§Location§§Sydney§§Work Type§§Casual/Vacation§§Classification§§Sport & Recreation§, §Coaching & Instruction§§§§§§§§§  §  §    §    §      §        § §        §Casual Gymnastics Coaches§        §          §Weekend penalties apply§          § §          §Five Dock Leisure Centre (FDLC) is a community focused leisure centre located in Sydney's thriving inner west. The Centre caters for over 450,000 visits per year, and comprises of a competition standard Gymnastics Hall, a two court Stadium which caters for indoor soccer, netball, badminton and basketball, as well as a leading Health Club comprising of two group fitness studios, cardio and weights areas.§          § §          §The Five Dock Leisure Centre attracts over 1400 gymnasts annually, catering for gymnasts from 18 months to Adult. The Centre has a large recreational gymnastics program and competitive program catering for state, national and international streams.§ § § §Our Gymnastics department is currently recruiting for the following roles:§ § § § §Coaches §($29.58 - $44.38 per hour including casual loading & penalty rates)§ § §We are looking for experienced gymnastics coaches to coach a wide variety of gymnastics classes from recreational through to competitive in both MG and WG gymnastics. Information§§Job Listing Date§§9 Sept 2020§§Location§§Sydney§, §North Shore & Northern Beaches§§Work Type§§Full Time§§Classification§§Sport & Recreation§, §Coaching & Instruction§§§§§§SENIOR COACH§Overview§Grand Slam Tennis operates in 2 locations in Sydney – at Cammeray Tennis Club and at Wheatleigh St Tennis Centre, Naremburn.  The centres are very busy with over 500 players participating each week in a range of coaching programs including Hot Shots, Adult and Junior Squads, School programs, high performance squads, and private lessons.  Please see our website at  §www.grandslamtennis.com.au§.§Position§Grand Slam Tennis is looking to appoint a full-time senior tennis coach who can work across a wide range of programs including high performance for elite players.§Hours/Remuneration§Grand Slam Tennis strives to deliver inspiring, inclusive tennis experiences and we are looking for an active, fun and enthusiastic team member to create a great environment.§Full Time Position. Hours will be predominantly Monday to Friday with one full day required each weekend (either Saturday or Sunday). Remuneration is based on qualifications and experience.§Qualifications/Experience§Tennis Australia Junior Development or international equivalent or higher is required§TA membership including Working with Children’s Check, Police Check and at a high level immediately, so being professional, motivated and organised will be key characteristics of the successful candidate.  Training/education is offered each year to all staff.§§§§

Dolphins Swim School offers an award winning program to the community on a School Term basis. We have a diverse and dynamic team that participate in regular paid training which is registered with AUSTSWIM for accreditation points towards qualification renewal.  §  § § About the person§  § The successful candidate should have previous experience in teaching swimming and water safety, a passion for learn to swim and availability weekday afternoons and weekend mornings; a minimum of one weekday afternoon and one weekend morning.  It would be preferred but not essential for applicants to have a Infant & Preschool Aquatic qualifications.  § § §Essential Qualifications§ §§Current AUSTSWIM or Swim Australia Teacher of Swimming & Water Safety§Current CPR §NSW Working with Children Check§  §What’s on offer§  § We are offering an attractive hourly rate of $28.63 plus 25% casual loading.§  § § Want to know more?§  § Further information regarding the requirements of this role can be found in the attached Position Description, alternatively for a confidential discussion please contact Suzanne Raven on §(02) 9806 5875§.§ § § How to apply§ Candidates MUST apply online at  §https://www.cityofparramatta.nsw.gov.au/about-parramatta/careers§  and answer the position selection criteria. Applications close  § 4pm, Monday 28 September 2020 § and will not be accepted through any other medium.§  Prohibited persons as defined under the NSW Child Protection Act are not eligible to apply. A copy of a valid Working with Children Clearance must be presented at Interview.  § This position requires the preferred candidate to undertake a Pre-Employment Medical Check, which also includes a Drug and Alcohol test. §   §  §The City of Parramatta supports a Drug and Alcohol free working environment and employees may be subject to random testing as a result.§ § § §City of Parramatta Council embraces diversity and encourages applications from Aboriginal and Torres Strait Islander people, people from Multicultural backgrounds and people with disability. We are committed to making reasonable adjustments to provide a positive, barrier-free recruitment process and supportive workplace.§  § § § Please note you must be an Australian or New Zealand citizen or a permanent resident or have unlimited working rights in Australia to apply for this position.§ §  §  §§§§
